39392983.review: Fate Extella is a really great game over all. I think the story mode could have been a bit longer to be honest. It felt like the game was a bit short. The side storys could also have something more to them, some of them feel like they lack things that the others have. Like Artoria's side story felt like it was lacking quite a bit. The game is challenging over all so im happy with that. The 3 main story lines feel well written, some really emotional things that happen which make you feel really invested. The mix of a visual novel game and actual fighting along with 3d characters made the game feel more interactive than usual visual novel games. The fighting and combo system is something i really enjoyed becouse it really took time to learn how each character works. I would defintely recommend this game to anyone who likes the fate series at first hand.

39392845.review:
Que dire sur ce jeux, à part que c'est une Agréable surprise. Tout les fans de Fate devraient être réjouis :

-16 servants à jouer : De l'Empereur des roses, la cinquième Nero à la terrible (Antagoniste mais pas vraiment) Altera ou Attila le Hun (Une jolie jeune femme huhuhu.)  selon votre préférences. Il y en a une grande variété en plus de cela avec bientôt la sortie de Fate/Extella Link qui nous fera rêvé en nous permettant de jouer 26 servants.

-La Bande son est magnifique, comme tout les Fate, d'habitude le son est très bon. 


Il y a aussi une très bonne Jouablité, en terme de personnages car il faut savoir qu'un Saber ne sera pas pareil qu'un Berserker par exemple ou qu'un Archer. Car pour les néophites du Nasuverse, qui veulent y jouer mais qui hésite, il y a un Oui et un Non qui sont à dire par exemple :

Oui : Vous pouvez vous amuser à défoncer des tas d'ennemis, à jouer des tas de personnages les plus charismatiques les uns que les autres.

Non : Il y a beaucoup de dialogues, certains trouvent ça ennuyeux mais d'autres sont fans car ça fait penser à la source d'où ça vient : Visual Novel. Et aussi que il y a beaucoup d'allusions à Fate/Extra qui est son précédent qui est un jeux sur PSP voir même Fate/Extra CCC mais je ne suis pas sûrs. En plus de cela, bien évidemment il y aura un anime en fin de mois, Fate/Extra Last encore qui pourra raconter cette partie donc, pas d'inquiétudes.

Pour moi, le jeux est énorme et c'est un oui, avec un gros O.

39381380.review:
《Fate/EXTELLA》：割草，也是要看厨力的

　　自2004年《Fate/stay night》首次亮相已经过去了13个年头，“Fate”从最初的PC平台galgame陆续发展为涵盖小说，漫画、动画、主机游戏，手机游戏等多元体裁，十余部作品组成的庞大系列；其原作公司，由武内崇和奈须蘑菇共同创立的TYPE-MOON也借此IP发展取得了商业成功，收获大批忠实粉丝。旗下手游《Fate/Grand Order》开始运营后，热度更逐年攀升，在全球二次元圈子里刮起一阵“Fate狂潮”。在国内还流传着“十万月厨百万王厨”（可褒义可贬义）的说法，足见其人气之高。

　　然而我本人充其量只能算是个初级爱好者而已。大约在10年前从同学口中知道了Fate系列和型月公司，最初只是被武内崇的插画所吸引，之后陆续看了些动画作品；唯一读过小说也最喜欢的反倒是《空之境界》，至于那些被誉为“正统”的Galgame更是一部都没有通关，甚至是元祖FSN几年来我尝试开坑数次最终均不了了之。细算下来今天要聊的《Fate/EXTELLA》竟是我正经从头打到尾的第一部型月游戏（不含FGO）。所以接下来我的一些言论若有不准确的地方，还请资深月厨海涵。

“Fate无双”之前的故事

　　《Fate/EXTELLA》是系列诞生至今的第一款动作游戏（FTG不算），属前作地位的《Fate/Extra》和《Fate/Extra CCC》均是迷宫RPG，开发商Imageepoch于2015年5月倒闭。该社开发的产品以掌机日式RPG为主，较知名的系列还有《弧光之源》，《第七龙神》等，不过这些作品的销量终究没能维持公司继续生存。21世纪10年代日本有大量中小型单机RPG厂商走向末路，往大的方面说这是日本游戏行业衰退，移动游戏崛起等原因导致的结果，Imageepoch只是沧海一粟而已。

　　总之，这次型月的合作伙伴找来了Marvelous，熟悉掌机游戏的玩家对这家厂商肯定不会陌生，既开发过《牧场物语》这样的经典系列，也代理发行过《闪乱神乐》，《英雄不再》，《胧村正》这样的名作。当然这些和《Fate/EXTELLA》没什么直接联系，只要知道论游戏开发实力Marvelous显然比型月高得多就行了，这也只是个相对的概念。

　　值得一提的是，担任《Fate/EXTELLA》的制作人一职的佃健一郎（Kenichiro Tsukuda）看似名不见经传，仔细查找相关资料我才发现，他居然是《装甲核心2（Armored Core）》和该系列后续多部作品的制作人，还担任过《九十九夜2（Ninety-Nine Nights II）》的监督一职。

　　说到《九十九夜》，部分老玩家应该还有印象，它是原世嘉知名游戏制作人水口哲也单飞后创建Q Entertainment公司开发的作品，在2006年xbox360上市初期发售，是一款割草（无双）动作游戏。当时宣传声势可不小，日韩合作开发，人物美型，还找来当红韩国歌手BoA（我也喜欢过一阵儿）演唱主题曲，号称要创造新时代的割草游戏…然而发售后游戏负面评价相当多，甚至还被抨击为半成品，最终销量很不理想。

　　到了《九十九夜2》Q Entertainment拉来另一家公司feelplus共同开发。佃健一郎就是feelplus社的员工。和前作一样，2代同样是割草游戏，改进了前作的一些缺陷，然后出现了一些新问题…比如画面变差了，角色变少了，怪物雷同严重，部分关卡拖沓耗时长，还被部分玩家戏称只按X键就能通关….如果说一代是吹破牛皮的假3A，2代就是变怂后缩减预算的小品作，总之这作卖的也不咋地，不算暴死也八九不离十了吧。

　　从From Software到feelplus，不知道佃健一郎经历了多少起起落落最后来到Marvelous。能开发一款Fate系列作品，某种意义上对他来说是种幸运吧，若不是借着这个IP的知名度，这款割草游戏绝对是卖不了这么多的，粗略估计，《Fate/EXTELLA》目前销量应该超过50万套。应该是他职业生涯中的里程碑了。

做游戏，还是要多学习一个

　　通过对《九十九夜》的一番对比，我惊奇地发现，《Fate/EXTELLA》中的一些缺点，正是从它“继承”而来。只是对Fate厨们来说，他们的注意力八成集中在游戏的故事和角色上，ACT的部分的粗糙并不会多在意。这方面和光荣那些动漫改编的二线无双作品素质上接近，都是骗原作粉丝的钱。但要比起《战国无双》，《战国basara》这些一线无双作品，《Fate/EXTELLA》在游戏系统上的单薄还是显而易见。

　　游戏地图总数不超过10张，每一关的玩法都基本相同，即占领所有据点，打败小boss（从者），最终对战大Boss（从者）。虽然大多关卡都会设置些所谓的支线目标，但都是诸如“XX分钟内杀死XX只怪物”这种家庭作业式的设计。激发玩家一直刷下去的动力终归是能控制各式各样的从者战斗，除了建模差点，他们的打斗动作，技能样式，宝具动画都能还原出设定的风韵。毕竟要是这点都做不到也没办法让粉丝买账。

　　至于游戏里的杂兵怪，在击破据点队长前都是会无限刷的，数量绝对管够，击破数都是以千为单位，开宝具更是直接灭全屏，爽快度可以有，但确实也没什么营养。而且如果不尽快杀死队长和受制体的话，已经占领的据点就可能被再次侵略，又要重新清理一遍，这么来回往复就会浪费很多时间，甚至导致任务失败。这是《Fate/EXTELLA》在前期唯一可能会带给玩家负面反馈的部分。

　　操作上，每位英灵的打击感和性能区分比较明显，技能连段的取舍也不尽相同。当然从根源上终究都是XY组合，差异基本就是停留在“同样的大范围清怪技能，尼禄是C4，大王是C2”这种层次上。但是面对boss时多少还是要对技能做出一些取舍，因为即便是easy难度下，boss级从者的伤害也是能轻易打掉你半血的。不过boss会不会出手，出手又能不能打中你，这就是AI的问题了，不在讨论范围内~

　　从者强度的平衡性是设定都搞不清楚的东西。在游戏的主线中有一半时间控制的都是尼禄，所以到通关时尼禄的练度也一定是最高的，自然也是技能最丰富，最好用的一个。每个从者都一定会有一两个最实用的技能，只是解锁需要的等级不同罢了。

　　主线任务里玩家会同时操作两个从者，在战斗过程中通过装备礼装的技能切换，此外每位英灵都有各自的支线故事，算是对主线另一种形式的补充。也有无双必不可少的自由模式，除了主线中的三位主角从者，其它从者更多都是在自由模式里使用的，所以通关主线后值得玩的内容其实还很多。

　　总体在内容丰富度上《Fate/EXTELLA》还是高出了我的期待值，割草的部分在对英灵们厨力加持的作用下变得没有那~~么容易陷入疲态，续作实装的英灵还会越来越多。如果你是掌机玩家，很有可能时不时还会拿出来刷一下。但还是切忌一次性刷太久，否则很快就会变得索然无味。

撩妹，还是我最拿手

　　如果你是尼禄，小玉，或大王的粉丝，请务必不要错过《Fate/EXTELLA》。这作文本剧情的部分占据了游戏主线内容的五成甚至更多，说是ACT骨子里也脱离不开galgame的套路。剧情姑且不作评价，但和女主角们调情的桥段可一点都不少。单论三位女主角的台词设计，声优念稿质量和福利演出，都足以令粉丝心灵沦陷。其中不乏有些露骨的内容，不得不佩服写骚话还是蘑菇有一套。

　　作为以角色设定为核心卖点的系列，Fate最大的魅力莫过于“传说和历史上的英雄们召唤到现世进行乱斗”，通俗些其实就是相声里的“关公战秦琼”。很多人也借着这个系列了解到不少以前不知道的传说故事。有了这样的前提，从某种程度上说Fate系列的故事可以“无止境”地创作下去。事实上也正因为型月早就意识到这点，我们才能看到今天衍生出那么多分支作品。

　　平行空间也好，伪典也罢，在人气角色已经深入人心的保障下，即便抛弃部分经典的设定，粉丝们依然能认出这就是他们熟悉的Fate，当真是角色萌时代有力的写照。在《Fate/EXTELLA》重新建立的世界观下，甚至对“万能的肝爆机——圣杯”这一系列以往核心的设定都只字未提，可谁又能说这不是Fate呢？换言之，也正是这种不破不立之举，让这个系列的未来又拥有了更多新的可能性。

　　ACG作品借鉴传说和历史人物的做法早就不是什么新鲜事，型月不是第一个这么干的，也绝不是最后一个，正所谓一个人的成功既要靠自身努力也要考虑到天时地利。如今FGO一次次拿下付费榜榜首时，谁又能想到传奇只是源自少年的中二幻想呢？对型月而言，FGO在移动平台的成功，和《Fate/EXTELLA》在家用机、掌机和steam平台的成功是极具战略意义的，这说明Fate游戏已经从最初galgame小众玩家圈子正式往主流市场扩张。乐观地看，《Fate/EXTELLA》作为新的开端获得了不错的成绩，续作发行也指日可待，按这样的节奏顺利发展下去，很有可能在将来能成为和光荣无双，CAPCOM《战国basara》一样的系列。

　　回忆起来，我刚接触FSN的时候，当时还对朋友说过，“如果Fate出一款MMORPG该多好，每个玩家都能得到自己的英灵，还能控制英灵像《鬼泣》的但丁一样战斗。”这话里的前半句，在10年后的今天看是不太可能实现了，谁都没想到MMORPG竟会落到现在的低谷。中间这句FGO里实现了，虽然和我想象的差别有点大；而最后这句最呈现的形式，大致就是《Fate/EXTELLA》。所以从这部作品最初公布我就有尝试的念想，毕竟这才是接近我理想中的Fate游戏。哪怕我已近过了会对这类题材心潮澎湃的年纪，要成为“正义的伙伴”的誓言，从来都没有忘记。

含配图完整版本请移步知乎：https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/32909793

39110599.review:
FATE/Extella is a boring game, shame on you Marvelous for making this game. The story has something to do with FATE, I never read or watch the anime, so I won't speak of it in my review. 

Graphic
The graphic quality in this game is average at best, a bit like PS3 graphic. Eventhough graphic is not the main factor in a game (at least for me), same thing can't be said for others. Fortunately characters's animation are a okay, and their design is somewhat unique but because of the mediocre graphic, it doesn't look good. One thing that I found entertaining is each characters Noble Phantasm and Extella Maneuver, pretty catchy especially the ones with big boobies (don't judge, I am a simple man)

Sound & music
Music is entertaining enough, still it can't help the boring gameplay. Sound and character's voices are okay, nothing to say in this matter.

Gameplay
This is the core of a game, while graphic, music aren't good enough, as long as the gameplay is good, people might be able to accept it, even liking it. Sadly, this is not the case in FATE/Extella. Basically, the gameplay can be described like this: go to a stage -> kill lots of enemies to summon the aggressors (the captain in an area) -> kill aggressors -> go to another area -> kill lots of enemies to summon the aggressors -> repeat steps 1 to 4 until you get enough keys to summon the regime matrix (you use this to summon the boss of that stage) -> defeat the boss, and you're done. 

Enemies has 6-7 variations, from agressor with sword, axe, stone/sling thrower, giant one, flying one, and plant (the thing that summons other aggressors), and all of them has color variations. From many stages, only one is different, the last boss stage.

There is no weapons in this game, only a code cast (kind like equipment, and the only one), each code cast can be crafted using QP (the currency in this game), but in order to get the blueprint for the code cast, you need to beat certain stage in certain difficulty in certain ranks. When you've crafted it, you can equip it, each code cast has 2 or more abilities to use (max is 4). 

Besides code cast, there is a thing called install skills, you can get this by defeating a servant or aggressors in any stage. Duplicate install skills will automatically fused together creating a higher level install skills, e.g.: EXP UP fused with another EXP UP will become an EXP UP+2, with max is +20. Each character has several slot skills which can be unlocked by increasing your bond with them. Bond can be increased by completing their respective side missions, all are easy. 

Conclusion:
FATE/Extella is clearly for a hardcore fans only, I bought this because the gameplay is similar to Dynasy Warriors series, but didn't think that it would be worse than Dynasty Warriors, at least in Dynasty Warriors you are not forced to kill hundreds of enemies just to summon the enemy's generals. If you are a hardcore fan, go for it, but I strongly advice to wait for a sale, it doesn't worth full price. If you are a DW fans, don't. Just wait for Dynasty Warriors 9 on February 2018.

39080399.review:
这算是一部粉丝向的游戏了，但并不只是就骗骗粉丝钱的，里面的模型虽然是用脚做的但是最重要的是剧情是用心写的，立绘CG是用手画的。里面的剧情还是写得真的特别不错而且还很有爱，而且里面主要的人物尼禄、玉藻前、阿提拉都非常棒。
这部作品好的地方就是在它的文本、立绘、cg、人物上，我们完全可以当文字游戏，无双割草当做买游戏送的内置小游戏。。。这也能算是一部不错的作品了。。。
如果是粉丝会觉得十分不亏，甚至有点赚，毕竟有这么多五星英灵给你玩，比什么沉船go要良心的多（哈哈哈嗝）

39075711.review:
Fate/EXTELLA是Fate系列唯一一部在Steam平台上发售的游戏，Fate/EXTELLA作为Fate/EXTRA和Fate/EXTRA CCC的续作，和前几部作品还是有所衔接。如果对设定不了解可以去玩前作或者查找Fate世界的设定，最方便的方式当然是看Fate的设定集，例如Fate/EXTELLA Material等。
这款游戏虽说是个割草的无双游戏，但还是应该将其视作一款小说阅读游戏，真正的战斗不多，但是剧情很丰富，配音也很好，主要时间还是在看剧情上，看不懂慢慢也会懂，不要轻易跳了。不过缺点是英灵的宝具为了游戏性而缩减至一个，希望宝具能自由选择啊。

38862155.review:
[h1]----Spoiler Talk in here, be adviced---[/h1]

I think Extella is the worst entry in the Extraverse series due to how it just shits on any base material.

The story starts semi-ok, the ending from Extra got retconned, but that's fine and can be forgiven. You start with following Nero, which isn't too bad.

But then comes the kicker, suddenly Tamamo is also there, and she recognizes you as her Master, she mentions that she was your sub-party Servant (Suddenly you had 2 Servants in Fate/Extra?) And just seems to be even more clingy than before, but that can be somewhat forgiven due to her personality being like that.

This is still... somewhat forgiveable.... You complete Nero's story and that's fine, it wasn't as bad as I thought and I quite liked the bittersweet ending (Nero gets a bad ending)


You then start Tamamo's story, which is just pure fanservice, its irrelevant to the plot at all and it's just her being cute and kawaii to you because you're her husband, this would be nice if it had anything to do with the plot, but you could literally cut this story out and Extella would be exactly the same..
It has a good ending which is nice, but that's about it.


Then starts Altera's route (The newly introduced Saber and main villain)
God this route is SO BAD, there are 2 Alteras (Titan Altera and Servant Altera) While one is a murder kill death machine that just plows down everything in its path, the other is a cute, kawaii, shy giant (Titan Altera) she calls you her prisoner, but treats you more like a guest, you're supposed to feel bad for her and then help her..

This is a terrible set up since well.. You're *actively* being the bad guy, and your character knows it, they even mention it.. You kill both your Main and Sub Servant (Nero and Tamamo) and your MC is like "this is fine" which makes absolutely 0 sense.

Then... Starts the true route.... This might be the worst thing in the existance of Fate besides Labyrinth.
You transport your memories from the third route (Altera route) to the you that's with Nero (Nero's route) so now you are the MC with knowledge over both Nero and Altera (but not Tamamo) You get Nero and Tamamo to team up in the end, which is.. okay I guess, since they both love you and want to help you..

But then Archimedes (#2 bad guy) does some spooky shit to Altera to make her a rampant murder death machine, together with a corrupted version of Liz who just seems to be a jackass and do nothing plot-relevant except meme you.

So you defeat Altera and you're like "noice" but then Archimedes pulls another card out of his ass and summons Velber (Some evil comet who annihilates civilizations), that is pretty interesting since it's supposed to be some unstoppable murder death machine 100x the scale of Altera (Tamamo basically gives up for a moment since 'it's all useless anyway' due to Tamamo having experienced this terror before (She is from the Age of Gods and has seen Velber descend once already, where earth almost got wiped) But you kind of convince both Nero and Tamamo to team up anyway.

After Altera dies, she gives her sword of Mars, which she stole from Ares himself, to Nero... Nero then uses the power of Mars and calls it upon herself to transform into 'Saber Venus' which is by definition, the worst character design in all of Fate, you can look it up and you'll see how trash it is, it is pure fanservice.

Then Tamamo is basically told to "sit back in the base and make sure everything is ok" while Saber Venus goes on to save the day with her autistic design and powers, somehow easily beating Velber and Archimedes even though Tamamo, a literal goddess of the Sun, couldn't do something like that... So instead of giving the actual really strong character the oppertunity to assist Nero, she is sidelined and not mentioned again.


So Velber has been defeated and all is well, but then somehow Altera is reborn as Atilla.. This is where it gets bad, Altera is suddenly a loli now ??? And the game ends with a happy end picture of Tamamo, you, Nero and Altera eating dinner, Tamamo seemingly having accepted her role in being part of a Harem, even though in Fate/Extra she mentions several times how much she absolutely hates harems and would castrate her Master if it would ever happen.

Fate Extella completely wipes any character development Tamamo ever got and replaces it with a generic "I love yu master please accept me" stereotype while leaving her on the side, on top of that the game circlejerks Nero literally all the time, and she clearly gets way more than she deserved. The dynamic between Titan Altera and Servant Altera is also just very wrong, and I feel like Altera would've been more interesting as just "Servant Altera" since that one actually had reasons to be like that, while "Titan Altera" was just shy and cute for the sake of making you try to feel bad for wanting to kill her, which really doesn't work.



Now, on to the gameplay... The gameplay feels like a terribly watered down clone of Dynasty Warriors, but without any of the good mechanics, the characters all usually only have 1 optimal combo and it is what you'll be spamming for the majority of the game, the game does not give any incentive to mix stuff up or whatever, you just do the easiest, most AOE hitting and damaging combo your char has, which usually consists out of hitting the same button 4 times and then pressing triangle or right click.

The stages all feel very bland and are being reused several times, there are some nice designs but you get really tired of it when it gets reused like 5 times in a row.


As a final note, since I haven't mentioned it anywhere else.

EMIYA (Nameless Archer) also gets completely shafted to the sideline and doesn't even get any story beyond ' I just joined Nero for mysterious reasons ' and even his side-story doesn't expand on it, all the sidestories with a few exceptions just felt very weak and added close to 0 to the character, they did not feel well made at all and felt more like they were filler because the game isn't actually worth $50.



Fate Extella completely destroys any development Fate/Extra ever gave to all 3 of the protagonist's Servants and instead tries to make it into a bundle of shit, everything is bad about it, and it has no redeeming factors besides that Archimedes seems like a decently written villain.

Instead of a redemption-like saga for Elizabeth, she instead goes even beyond the boundary of what I thought what was possible to become even more unlikeable, she doesn't do anything relevant in the game except taunt you and your Servant while being a bother to Archimedes.



As a final verdict, I think Fate/Extella is one of the worst Fate material games I've ever seen in my life, and I honestly wish it didn't exist, people always say "Be happy that <your favorite character> gets to star in another game and be good" but that really really isn't the case, I think most Tamamo fans could agree that the game made her worse in every way possible and shat on the material, Fate/Extra and CCC were much better on their own than the autistic mix that Extella is.

On top of that, the new SHAFT Anime (Fate/Extra Last Encore) Will be the prequel for Fate/Extella instead of following Nero's original route, and from what I've read on Nasu's blog, it is a fucking mess.. It truly throws away any development for Tamamo, while Emiya gets a somewhat decent one, but that doesn't matter since he's just forgotten in Extella anyway.

I do not recommend you buy this game because it's really bad in every way possible, the story is bad, the gameplay is bad and the design is bad.. The voice acting is good as always, the char design stays to the original (And adds some nice new outfits for Nero and Tamamo) and the translation is good, there are no complains from me in that regard, the translation was one of the better things.

38852872.review:
This game was on sale for $41.99 (CAD). When I realized that you have to complete 3 stories of each servant (Nero Claudius, Tamamo no Mae and Attila), I knew this game would take a long time to fully complete the story (I've finished the main story in 10 days, pretty slow but promised myself to finish it before the new year). But it's worth it because it sums up how the master's mind, soul and body got separated. To be honest, what I mostly like about this game is talking with your servant. I really enjoy their conversation and making choices to see how they react.  

The gameplay is about raiding other servant's lands and defeating the boss servant. But, it has 5-6 stages and you have to do the same for that. Personally I find killing the aggressor and claiming their land a bit more difficult than fighting the boss servant.

All the servants has a different fighting style and my favorite would be Tamamo since she uses magic skills. They do have a simple combo list and it's pretty easy to master the combos. But if you do try to abuse the combos for less than 20 seconds (i'm estimating how long, so not an accurate timing), the boss can counter or escape it. Servants can use a form change that makes them take down enemies easily. But the transformation depends on the character (for example, Nero is based on fire and Tamamo is based on snow). 

-FPS is locked to your refresh rate, which is great! 
-Graphics 7.5/10
-Story 8/10
-Gameplay 7/10

For $41.99 on sale I'm really happy with this game. Usually I don't buy games that are over $40 but I knew this game would entertain me for a long time. If you like hack and slash games, this game might be for you.

9/10

38763031.review:
O que marca este jogo e as visual novel da série de Fate sem dúvida é o roteiro aliado a um universo, em essência, bem construídos. 
                    A pegada do jogo vem da base de Fate/Extra com algumas diferenças, os cenários tem modificações leves, não adentrarei mais para NÃO dar spoilers, contudo tem uma temática mais de 'mechas' e tecnologias. O player, ao contrário de FATE/Extra, não pode escolher o heroi inicial, todos jogam com a  Red Saber (Nero) e somente zerar oi jogo pela primeira vez libera a segunda rota, após zerar esta, ai libera a última rota. Isto me frustou, é um modo de forçar o player a liberar personagens no history mode e liberar as side quests (que estão contando as pontas soltas da história
), o porém é que, no meu caso, detesto a Caster e sou forçado a ir naquela rota para liberar alguns personagens e/ou jogar a rota da Alteria.
                    O jogo tem um modo apenas, semelhante ao FATE/Extra, o de conquistar áreas do cenário. O modo é divertido, mas repetitivo e acaba cansando o jogador no mais tardar.
                     Em termos de história, está impecável. Quem é fã do universo, como eu, deveria jogar e zerar as três rotas. Se for unica e exclusivamente pela gameplay, existe jogos melhores. Espero ter ajudado vocês

38308273.review:
Never played a Type-Moon game before, so this was my first introduction to the Fate series. I seriously don't see how anyone couldn't follow the plot or that it was hard to understand what was going on because they weren't a fan of the series... sure it makes reference to past games, and I think maybe the anime, and the characters are mostly past entries in this series, but the plot of this game is not really a continuation, it's just based in the Fate universe with it taking place after Fate/Extra. You can play this as a standalone game and enjoy what it has to offer. I adored the characters, and I thought the plot in terms of the relationship dynamics was executed wonderfully. 
The gameplay itself is inspired by the Musou series of games (Dynasty Warriors, Samurai Warriors, Warriors Orochi), and it does a great job of adding enough original ideas mixed with that style to feel like it's own thing. There could be some improvements, and hopefully, the sequel will fix that, but as hack and slash, 1 vs 1000 game, it does it's job well, and me being a Musou game fan, I loved it. It also doubles as a visual novel/dating type of game too, as you bond with the characters you play as. I like this idea over the Koei Tecmo games because it adds a more human element to the characters you control, I care for the character I play as because I've befriended them and bonded with them through my interactions with them. I just wish there was more than the three charcaters that you could have this interaction with, because I would love to have that same level of interaction with a character like Artoria Pendragon or Elizabeth Bathory, something which again I hope they improve in the sequel. 

Other than that. Great game. If you like Dynasty Warriors and the various spin-offs (Like Hyrule Warriors and/or Fire Emblem Warriors) you'll probably love this, and with the added visual novel feel with the "dating" elements it's probably gonna appeal to the "waifu/husbando" lovers out there. And this game is certainly well suited on the Nintendo Switch with the fact that you can take this anywhere and enjoy hack and slash action on the go and on a big TV. Can't wait for the sequel!

38226759.review:
Yo this game may have given me a fetish for giant women but it kinda stinks as a musou game.

It's got all the basics of a musou game.  You run around carving huge swathes through enemy armies, occasionally ending battles with 5-digit kill counts.  Enemy bosses are the only real threats, but you're expected to rip through them too.  Somewhat similarly, Allied servants are really just doorstops that will occasionally tell you things.  They're not useful and they're really not worth protecting and I don't even know why they're in the game.  
Some of the mechanics are just plain unfair.  I've had maps where every enemy zone has a planter and they're just spewing badguys to the opposite sides of the map.  You spend all your time interrupting them while other zones are getting taken over.  Then when you fight off enemy attackers, new planters spawn out of nowhere and start assaulting zones you've just liberated and it's just stupid.   Zone traps are a terrible mechanic, only coming into play to hurt the player.  If I could throw cu chulainn into zones to trigger traps, he'd finally be useful to me.  But no, you have zero control over allies despite being a commander of some sort.
The Extella maneuver is not great.  It's super useful but it takes a long time to pull off and watching the same animations play out and hearing the same lines over and over again is not very entertaining.  

Graphically, the game is fine even if a few of the character models' faces all feel kind of off.  The animations are great and they do a lot to hide things but then sometimes they zoom in on Nero's face and her dead eyes are looking at you and you don't understand what emotion she's trying to convey and it kinda breaks the tension in a scene.

The writing is typical Fate stuff.  Everyone is a badass and all the girls want your D for reasons that aren't really explained well.  The game is a sequel but about you don't actually get that much backstory beyond that you won a holy grail war on the moon and saber was your servant.  Not a whole lot about the setting is explained.

Music is decent.  Voice work is Excellent.

I would only recommend this game if you're a big fan of the Fate franchise and you could grab it for like... 10 bucks.

38140714.review:
[b] This review contains spoilers. [/b]
So first of all I would like to tell you that as someone who has watched most of the Fate series from "Fate/Zero" to "Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works" to even parodies of the Ufotable work like "Carnival Phantasm" and continue's to play Fate/Grand Order on his mobile phone, not to mention playing the original Fate visual novel through all three routes that it provides, I was very much so excited to see Fate/EXTELLA coming to STEAM and as a big fan of the FATE series I was not disappointed there is many characters from that you all love, from Nero ([spoiler]Umu! [/spoiler]) to Artoria Pendragon who can be unlocked in one of the stages and is my favorite part of the game due to watching Fate (there is a tutorial look it up on the steam fan of the game page) not to mention Tamamo no Mae,The holy virgin Jeanne d'Arc,Altera,Gil 16 all in all...
You progress through the game and the main story by fighting and taking over sectors of the Moon Cell and battling servants in those sectors. But the thing is, is that there is a lot of going back and forth through the sectors since some mob's can invade sectors that you've taken over so you have to go back and take them back again and kill the mob's that can invade your sectors, personally I think this was a move to expand the game time by a large amount, but I wouldn't say that it wasn't a bad move since personally I very much so enjoyed going back and taking them back again. The story itself isn't that interesting or crazy during the Nero route its just you and Nero (who very much so provides a lot of fan service and is pretty much in love with you) trying to find out why is the other half of you is with Tomoe no mae and essentially trying to get that other half back since you don't feel whole, its not a very, serious story but its a fun one.
The combat itself is what makes the game for me its extremely fun to use your noble phantasm and unlocking new moves, and the way you unlock new moves is by leveling up your servant, throught the story, there is also a bunch of upgrades that you can get, you can get new kind of upgrades by just fighting the enemies and picking them up or by buying them with ingame money which you acquire also by fighting enemies and  progressing through the story, you also get upgrades not only for your servant but for yourself of which you can use by healing your servant, switching to another servant or nullifying some of the effects that some sectors have, there is also many other more but you can find out yourself by playing the game.
There is 3 routes the first one being with Nero, second with Tomoe no mae and the third one with Altera. If you do all the three routes and all the side servant missions there is probably well over 50 hours that you can get in the game, this game is a must for all the Fate series fans who love like the anime and Fate/Go (everyone who went through Gachia hell can go trough this too lol) fans, for anyone else I would first advise you to watch the "Fate/Zero" and "Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works" and other Fate stuff like FATE/CCC and then decide if you like the lore and the series, though you can absolutely don't do that and just jump right into the game since the knowledge is not needed, but doing what I what said would expand your understanding of the game.

37677971.review:
Nachdem ich den ersten Main Arc (und zwei Side Arcs) des Spiels beendet habe, fühle ich mich bereit meine Empfehlung für [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/511680/FateEXTELLA/] Fate/EXTELLA	[/url] auszusprechen.
Wer sich nicht die ausführliche Review durchlesen möchte kann bis zum Ende scrollen. Dort findet ihr eine kurzes Fazit mit meiner Gesamtbewertung.

[h1]Was ist Fate/EXTELLA?[/h1]

Fate/EXTELLA ist ein typisches Hack and Slash Spiel wie jedes andere. Hacke dich durch tausende von Feinden und fühle dich dabei wie der mächtigste Mensch im Universum. Oder sollte ich eher Servant sagen? Denn es ist ein Spiel des Fate Franchise von Type-Moon, wem das jetzt nichts sagt kann sich entweder auf Wikipedia einlesen oder sich die beiden Anime-Serien [url=https://myanimelist.net/anime/10087/Fate_Zero?q=Fate] Fate/Zero	[/url] und [url=https://myanimelist.net/anime/22297/Fate_stay_night__Unlimited_Blade_Works?q=fate] Fate/Stay Night	[/url]anschauen. Dabei ist aber zu beachten, dass Fate/EXTELLA in einem alternativen Universum als Sequel zu Fate/EXTRA spielt und somit nicht eins zu eins das gleiche ist wie die originale Fate Serie. Dennoch fehlt einem etwas das Verständnis, wenn man ohne Vorwissen mit Fate/EXTELLA beginnt und deswegen empfehlen ich Fate/Zero und Fate/Stay Night wärmstens, auch weil Fate/Zero ein großartiger Anime ist :P.

Nachdem wir einen kleinen Abstecher in das Fate Universum gemacht haben, muss ich noch die vorhandene "Erotik" im Spiel erwähnen. Ja, man wird als Hauptcharakter in eine Art Harem geworfen, was aber gerade so in Maßen vorkommt um mir nicht den Spielspaß zu verderben. Man hat auch wenigstens noch das Gefühl, dass Emotionen vorhanden sind.

[h1]Grafik/Map Design[/h1]

Die Grafik ist ja eh immer sehr subjektiv, aber man kann denke ich dennoch sagen, dass es ist ein durchaus hübsches Spiel ist. Es kann ganz klar mit keine AAA Titel mithalten, aber besitzt dennoch seinen Charm. Die Texturen sind eher im Ps3 Standart gehalten, werden aber etwas durch die schönen Partikel und dem Lichtverhältnis retuschiert. Die Karten sind abwechslungsreich und mit Liebe zum Detail gestaltet.

Alles in allem nichts Perfektes, aber ansehnlich.

[b]7/10 Punkte[/b]

[h1]Charaktere[/h1]

Dadurch, dass das Fate Franchise jeden Servent auf eine historische oder mythologische Persönlichkeit aufbaut hat jeder eigene Idiale, Gefühle und eine eigene filmreife Hintergrundgeschichte. Größen wie König Arthur, Alexander der Große oder Ceasar/Kaiser Nero kommen im Spiel vor. Dabei bringt jeder seinen eigenen Witz und Charm mit. Diese Masse an Charakteren macht das Franchise gerade so interessant und spannend.Jeder findet einen Charakter mit dem er sich verbunden fühlt. Auch in Fate/EXTELLA lassen sich einige bekannt Persönlichkeiten aus Fate finden.

[b]9/10[/b]

[h1]Story[/h1]

Der großte negativ Punkt des Spiels. Man wird in eine Handlung geworfen, von der man am Anfang vielleicht ein Viertel versteht. Nachdem man bekämpft, erobert und beschützt hat passieren irgendwelche "unerwarteten" Handlungen die alles auf den Kopf stellen. Kurz um Anime-Klischee Story.

[b]5/10[/b]

[h1]Kampfsystem/Steuerung[/h1]

Man metzelt sich durch Horden von Gegnern um dann zwischen drin ein paar Nebenbosse und am Ende den Endboss zu besiegen. Dabei ist das Kämpfen gegen die Standartgegner ein reines Buttonsmashen und wird dann gegen Bosse etwas anspruchsvoller. Dabei zeigt das Kampfsystem gerade so viel Tiefe um nicht Langweilig zu werden. Die Standartabfolge von normalen Angriffen lässt sich mit einer Sondertaste und der Sprungtaste kombinieren. Das ermöglicht die Fläche oder die Stärke der Angriffe zu beinflussen. Zusätzlich kommen noch Charakter spezifische Modi einher, wie Excalibur von Artoria/Arturia. Jeder Charakter hat unterschiedliche Angriffe und Statistiken, was eine Menge Abwechslung bietet.

Aber einer meine absolut liebsten Feature ist das Noble Phantasm. Dabei enthüllt der Servant seine wahre Idenitität um einen machtvollen Angriff auszuführen. Jedes Noble Phantasm sieht anders aus und ist einfach nur überwältigend. [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xAvOKXAelf8&feature=youtu.be]Als Beispiel zur Veranschaulichung[/url]

Kurz um solide aber nichts komplexes.

[b]8/10[/b]

[h1]Bonus und Fazit[/h1]

Fate/EXTELLA ist dem Fate Franchise absolut würdig. Charaktere sind gut gewählt, das Kampfsystem macht laune und hat dabei einen der schönsten Anime-Stile den ich kenne. Die Story ist nichts originelles, aber auch nicht langweilig. Ein gutes Spiel, was durch meine Liebe zum Fate Franchise vielleicht etwas zu gut bewertet wird. Neben bei ist der Soundtrack wie in den anderen Teilen Fate/Extra und Fate/Extra CCC absolut genial.
Die Steam Hintergründe und Badges sind auch absolut awesome. :3

Deshalbt kriegt Fate/EXTELLA von mir zusätzliche [b]5 Punkte[/b]. Ich möchte in dem Abschnitt nicht rein strikt etwas Bewerten sondern eher originelle Titel von der Masse abheben. Deswegen sieht das vielleicht im ersten Moment nach sehr wenig Punkten aus, soll aber nur dazu dienen, dass nicht jedes Spiel sich um die 30-40 Punkte bewegt. Denn ich vergebe hier auch gerne Minuspunkte.


[b]34/50 Punkten[/b]

37574409.review:
emmmm第一次评测就给这游戏了。
首先，在游戏性上就不说了，割草游戏都懂。
说说缺点吧
一前期的战斗过于枯燥无味...被吕将军霸体打的是真的难受...前期招式比较单一。
二角色建模，这不说了，都知道
三割草系统比较恶心...相对于真三那种老牌割草机，这部游戏的任务机制不怎么友好。
四怪物过多...多到....影响视线，基本流程都是刷刷刷，密度太大了
五NPC的能力略低，有些鸡肋
六价格...相对质量，这价格有些显贵
七战场物品种类有些单一
当然，这游戏有不少优点
一立绘好舔，声音好听
二战斗系统比较完善，可玩性比较高
三剧情
四在英灵招式设计，BOSS设计方面有明显特征，蛮细节的
五角色比较多，可尝试的新花样也多
六BGM方面，很好听
七打击感不错，招式自由度
总之不算好，但也不算差，虽然价格较贵，但不妨打折购买，消磨时间，啃啃剧情还是很值得玩的
其次
不知道制作方为嘛设置存档删除这种按钮在主界面最后一项【感受恶意】

37489152.review:
已通全部主线，想说说感受和想法。
（以下内容有所剧透）


我只说剧情，对于第一次接触月之圣杯故事的我来说，对尼禄线和玉藻线并不是很感冒，而是阿提拉线彻彻底底地打动了我，阿提拉和肉体岸波的故事让我久久不能忘怀，已经很久没有这样能感动我的故事了，所以我也内心期待着最终拯救他们二人的结局。
但我没有期待到。
结局里，阿提拉是重生了，而不是被拯救，至少和我所想的拯救区别很大。
从最后的片段来看，阿提拉仿佛是个婴儿，如果是没有了之前的记忆那我会非常非常的失望，如果是有记忆，那最后那一段完全没有表现出来，可能是作者倾向于尼禄为主，但对我这种专注于阿提拉线的来说可以说对结局很失望，肉体的岸波消失了，这我也接受，但是英灵阿提拉消失，巨神阿提拉重生这种结局我完全不能接受，实在是让我很难过，这种难过倒不如让阿提拉随着肉体岸波一起消失来得痛快。（还好我可以去阿提拉线去看羁绊剧情）
当然了，这只是我的感受，毕竟世界不会为了某一个人而运转，谁都会遇到自己不喜欢的结局，写下这些只是因为我没他处可以分享自己的感受，如果真的有人能读到这里，我想说，真的谢谢你。

37485810.review:
那是很悠远的回忆了。
虽然明白，这份过去的记忆已不能重新经历。
但，真的好想再见到她们，真的好想再同她们一起享受蔚蓝的天空和青葱空旷的原野。
于是，我默默地祈祷着，
祈祷着可以让我手上的令咒重新填满，重新感受到那份羁绊。
终于，
·“Master！”
啊，那令人怀念的声音再度在耳畔响起，一转头，她的金发依旧和太阳争抢着光辉，一身火红的盛装，只是眼中好像积攒着欣慰的泪水。
“主人！我回来啦。”
嘿，不用看，她一定还穿着她的蓝色的和风法师装，摇摆着毛茸茸的狐尾，故意摆出诱人的姿势，等着戏弄她的御主。

这只不过是大地上他和她们分别又重逢的众多故事里的一个，只不过是发生在我的身上，所以泪流满面。
Fate can never be predicted.

37439264.review:
- 달빠가 아니라면 구입을 심각하게 고민하는것을 추천합니다. 세일율이 몇프로든간에 후회할거라고 생각됩니다.
- 저는 페이트 시리즈를 아예 플레이를 안하고 무쌍류 게임을 하려는 흥미본위로 샀습니다, 그쪽생각으로 사시려는 분은 당장 뒤로가기를 누르시기 바랍니다.
--- 팬 아닌관점에서 쓴겁니다

1. 모델링 : 진짜 심각합니다, 널린 동인겜보다도 못한수준으로 모델링이 되어있습니다. 인체비율도 안맞고 윤곽선안맞아서 얼굴이 사각턱이 되질않나 손가락이 뾰족손가락으로 된걸보고 야 이걸 어떻게 원가 5만원대에 쳐팔지 하는 생각이 안날래야 안날수가 없습니다. 일러를 따라가는건 바라지도 않는데 최소한 보는사람이 불편하게 하진 말아야죠 심지어 수영복 스킨을 2200원대에 쳐팔고있습니다 여러의미로 대단합니다. 그..뭐야 저기 이쁜모델링을생각하시고 오셨다면 마침 비슷한제품에 섬란카구라가 있네요 심지어 저게 더 싸네요 저거하세요 적어도 이거사서 하는거보단 자괴감덜할것 같습니다. 이겜은 사지마세요.

2. 조작성 : 여느 이식게임이 그렇듯 굉장히 불친절하고 불편합니다 키보드 조작감도 더할나위없이 더럽한데 그놈의 분기공격에 화면 고정좀 안시켰으면 좋겠습니다 그렇다고 마우스로 화면조정하면 무슨 라인하르트 윈드밀마냥 화면이 휙휙돌아갑니다 누가봐도 '엑박패드 없어? 하지마ㅋ'라고 게임자체에서 말해주고있습니다. 사지마세요.

3. 타격감 : 무쌍류게임 생각하고 플레이 하신다면 님들이 생각하는 그 타격감은 없습니다 당장돌아가세요. 진짜 무쌍류게임하면서 타격감없는거는 처음보는거같습니다. 저기 동영상 화질구지에 개낚여 보면서 어 괜찮은데? 라고 잠시나마 생각한 수 시간전의 제 머리통을 찍어버리고싶습니다 그 쓸데없는 분기공격기술이 화면전환하면서 있을법한 타격감도 다 씹어버립니다 그나마도 타격감이있을법한 기술들은 타격지점이 적유닛보다 뒤로가버려서 쓰지도않게되고 좀만 조절잘못해도 공중에 떠버리고 심지어는 데미지가 심각하게 차이가나서 안쓰게됩니다. 쓸데없이 스킬모션만 계속 바라보는게 내가 이 구린모델링의 스킬연출 그것도 배경도 거의 생략된 연출을 보려고 이걸하나 싶습니다. 사지마세요.

4. 스토리 : 예 당연하죠 이것도 안드로메다로 보내버렸습니다. 게임 자체가 별과 달에 관한 스토리라서그런지 저기 몇억광년은 시대를 잘못만난 곳에서 만들어진 스토리같네요. 라노벨보다도못한 스토리에 최소한 독자가 읽으면서 음 맥락이 이렇구나하며 탁 하고 들어와야하는데 그런게 전혀없습니다 그 뭣같은 스토리를 설정으로 때워버립니다. 전작을 하고 안하고의 문제가 아닙니다 읽고있다보면 내가 미연시를 하는건가 아님 무쌍게임을 하는건가 아님 중2병 소설을 보는건가 구분이안갈정도입니다. 스토리궁금해서 사시는거면 사지마세요 차라리 그돈으로 오늘 치킨을 뜯으면 두마리나 먹을수있습니다 그럼 만족만족대만족인데 이거사면 오늘하루가 불편하실겁니다. 사지마세요.

5. 컨텐츠 : 이미 저기위엣것들이 없는시점에서 컨텐츠가 있을리가 만무합니다 최소한 장비셋팅이라든가 포인트로 업그레이드하는스킬셋이라든가 생각했는데 그런것도 없습니다. 특수이벤트 뭐 스토리진행도에따른 이벤트 이런것도 불가능하고 노가다컨텐츠라고 하기엔 게임자체가 더럽게 지루해서 한번 플레이한 스테이지는 다시쳐다보면 구역질이 날정도입니다. 사지마세요.

콘솔게임들 이식 개판으로해서 팔아먹는건 알고있는데 이건 진짜 너무 화가나서 리뷰올립니다 거기 지나가던 달빠분들은 그냥 사시든 마시든 하시고 다른분들은 안사는것을 정신건강을 위해 추천드립니다

37332794.review:
优点：
[list]
    [*]生动的人物形象，个人认为主线第三章（未明篇）中对“我”和阿提拉和阿提拉的刻画表现得最为优秀（FGO玩家能在大王的肚子上回复魔力么），还有很多支线关卡对非主要角色的英灵做了刻画，有搞笑的，有百合的，有为扩大世界观挖坑的，还有……搞笑的
    [*]优秀的立绘，这点其实各有所见，wada老师普遍评价还挺好的，我觉得至少阿尔托莉雅很帅就行了
    [*]优秀的配音
    [*]对世界观的扩大，关于游星、Moon Cell以及3名尖兵等等。这点月厨应该很开心，又有新设定可以脑补、推理、撕逼了。另外很多设定其实没有在游戏文本里出现，想要深入了解的建议去了解本游戏的设定集的相关内容
[/list]

缺点：
[list]
    [*]糟糕的建模，成本想必很低
    [*]单调的战斗，作为一个无双游戏，这个游戏的战斗基本就是 抢区块->友军有难千里驰援->继续抢区块->过关 或者 抢区块->友军有难->更多友军有难->GG。我感受到的只有烦躁和GTMD龙娘你怎么这么快就挂了
    [*]DLC多且贵，还都是服装DLC，基于缺点第一条……我还不如去买P社的DLC
[/list]

推荐入手人群：
喜欢看故事的玩家：这个故事(除了黄油不少以外)真的很值得一看，另外建议打折时入手，以及战斗调简单
FGO玩家：可以看看你们老婆3D化后的动作，总比沉船值吧
普通月厨：还是建议等打折
石油巨佬月厨：DLC全购入就是打折

37018399.review:
从PSV版而来，个人认为，这个游戏不算出色，但绝不像有些人说的那么不堪。以下列出几点感想吧。
＋剧情
＋操控性
＋宝具动画
＋厨
－建模
－画质
－AI
游戏类型可以说是无双类，但这不能成为扣分点，无双咋啦？难道fate系列只能出文字类和回合制的？当年的真三·三玩下来不也好的很的。
这个游戏最早是PSV上的，然后又出了ps4的，现在移植到steam，材质确实不佳，这个是扣分项。
有人说这个游戏不值这个价，我个人是不赞同的。这个游戏在PSV和4上价格都是300＋的，就算现在也都还是200＋，国区100出头相比之来说已经很便宜了，何况steam时不时还有优惠季。再者，fate系列大多数游戏都是要看剧情的，本作剧情并不差，作为fate系列一个独立的分支剧情是很可以的。最重要的，fate系列大都为厨向游戏，本作中的英灵大都是人气很高的角色。
说到这我想用fgo来说明一下，也是给厨向玩家一个提醒。我也玩fgo，但说实话我对回合制游戏不感兴趣，在我看来fgo的可玩性也不高，玩fgo很多人就是厨角色和剧情。但是，在fgo里，你想要一个高人气英灵，你要攒多少石头？如果想要的英灵都入手，无氪几乎不可能，那么，氪一单，要多少钱？再加上抽池子要看人品，非洲人一单下来卵都没有也是家常便饭。再看看这个游戏，有多少高人气角色？尼禄C狐贞德金闪闪小太阳呆毛王红A大王大帝等等，只要100多就能全部入手，何乐而不为？在fgo如果以上英灵想全部得到氪金数量绝对要四位数往上。虽然人物模型差了点，厨力有了这点小事可以克服，而且宝具动画大多数做的都还可以，况且本作中这些角色可以自己控制，比回合制看着他们自己打不有意思？
最后，本作本质上可以算是厨向游戏，质量不算太差，一定要看剧情！！不看剧情或者对fate一点不了解的就不要来了。还有，对fate乃至型月的了解仅限于fgo的，也不要乱嚷嚷了。

36990127.review:
这是某吧dalao给的解决游戏停止工作的方法


steam版出现game.exe停止工作的原因是集显的问题，这里说一下怎么调显卡：
A卡：桌面右键配置可交换显卡，找到Fate\EXTELLA的程序换成省电模式。
N卡：桌面右键选择英伟达控制面板，在3D设置的程序设置中找到Fate\EXTELLA然后选择高性能。如果找不到的话，就在全局设置中将首选图形处理器设为高性能即可。

36350960.review:
Fate/EXTELLA   用心做立绘   ·  用胳膊肘子做游戏 。 人物建模一塌糊涂。油光铮亮的奶子和占脸1/2比例的眼睛。但是立绘贼鸡儿漂亮。尼禄，C狐，女王全程语音陪跑。呆毛，红A，大狗，R姐还有众多你想要的仨万头。操作满分，打击感满分。混合着galgame风格的无双游戏。想听尼禄撒娇么？想听C狐娇喘么？想看大王的少女心么？ 还特娘的不买 ？

附上隐藏角色saber阿尔托莉雅获取方法，这是刷了这么久我个人觉得最快捷的途径：主线剧情尼禄篇第三章(boss贞德)，地图D区，没记错的话应该是左下角，出现条件是你吃掉5个炒面面包，在刷出大帝和最终boss贞德之后把他们引到D区，然后扛一波伤害同时刷杂鱼，掉血之后小兵会掉落面包，累计吃够5个，就会出现吾王。别问为什么要两个都引过来，你刷杂鱼时候连击很可能一不小心就把贞德打死了，贞德如果死了就不会出现吾王。等你吃够5个面包之后第9职介eater会从天而降，这时候你只要消灭冲进来跟你抢食的呆毛就好了，千万不要先打死贞德，否则呆毛会撤退。
希望对喜欢这款游戏的咕哒子们有帮助

36230320.review:
取り合えず始めのネロパートのみクリア。7時間掛かってるけど、途中どっか寝落ちしたっけな。。。
イベント解放率見ると、まだ殆ど解放されてないので結構長くなりそうですね。

単刀直入にいうと、10点満点なら６点ぐらいかなというのが今のところの感想です。
お勧めにしてますが、「どちらともいえない」があれば現段階では確実にそれです。

これ大事ね→日本語完備。日本の作品なので当たり前と思えど実際そうでないケースが多いため貴重。
後因みにいうと、アニメやゲームのFate原作等は殆ど知りません。

某会社が開発を手掛けていれば確実にFate無双ってタイトルで発売されてたでしょうね。
もう言わずと知れたxxxxxxxxという感じで同一ボタン連打するだけのゲーム。
xxxyやxxxxyもあるって？　面倒なので結局大半の人はxxxxxxxxxxx連打でしょうね。
暫く無双系やってなく久しぶりだと楽しいかもとか思いますよね？　基本10分後にはまた飽きてます。

普通の無双系に比べマップがセクター毎に分かれていて、マップが敵に侵略される速度は若干速いと思われるので、
他の無双系ゲームよりはマップ上のセクターを行ったり来たりするので忙しい感じがします。

サーヴァントとの絆レベルを上げたり、スキル付き武具を開放したり、スキルを装備するといった普段の無双ゲームだと無い様な追加要素はあります。まあ、反対に無双系の武器チェンジがないので結局はそれに値してしまうのでしょうけども。

グラはまあ何というか頑張ってるんでしょうけども、やはりどこか時代遅れな気がしますね。
1080p最高設定にしてもどこかぼやけた感が拭い切れません。

プレイ前に聞いていた話ではストーリーが凄く面白いとかで！？　正直ストーリー詰まらないなとか考えながらネロルートはやっておりました。とは言え、最後の方で幾らか先（他ルート）が気になる展開に発展してきたのは確かであり、何気に今後に期待してはいます。（実際やるかどうかは不明ですが）

後個人的にはネロも玉藻も声が全くもって不快にしか感じられません。あくまで個人的意見なんで、Fateファンの皆様、お許しくださいませ。

結局良いことは何一つ書いてませんって？　あからさまにお勧めしないを選ぶ理由がないというだけです。
実際お勧めするとなると、無双系が大好き！っ子かFate命！って人に限るでしょうね。2つの内1つも当てはまらない人には自信を持ってお勧め致しません。

全然参考になりませんね、ここまで読ませてしまい真に申し訳ありませんでした。
（ビキニ系DLCさえ買えばきっともっと評価は上がるはず）←（DLCを購入しないといけないという点でまた評価が下がってしまうんだが。。）

35847270.review:
Before I start I have to point out that the game is NOT a good way to start getting into the world of Fate, and if you are not familiar with the series at all, I suggest playing the Visual Novels first or watch the Anime. 

[b] I will try to keep this review spoiler-free, but it might contain minor details and spoilers. [/b]

This is the first Fate game I got to actually play, being a huge fan of the anime, I liked it.

In Fate/Extella, you have a main story, which has 4 "routes", each rout is telling the same story, but from a different character's perspective, and 13 side-stories for each servant available. 
I will give props to the fourth route, it is much better than the other 3 on every possible aspect.

The Lore is well made, very touching with a fare amount of comedy. However, it can get a little annoying and tiring if you are not used to reading a lot of text. It is not, by any means, comparable to a visual novel by that matter, but the game does rely on big amounts of text.

Combat is fun, but just like every musou game, it can get really boring after a while. If you are not a fan of this "musou" style game, I suggest skipping this one.
Moving on to Extella, the Camera is indeed a horrible disaster. It slowed me down quite a lot while I was trying to figure out where I'm going exactly, or when trying to properly execute a full combo on an Aggressor. It was also a pain in the *** when navigating through a complex area.

The level design wasn't really that good either. It was kind of impressive while playing the first route, but after seeing the same levels again and again, while fighting the same enemies again and again, it became boring and I grew tired of it. 
Characters are interesting and fun to interact with, the Bond system also adds and it's
satisfying once you get the right choices which increase the bond level.

Overall - If you enjoy the style of musou games, beating up thousands of enemies, and you are a Fate fan, this game is perfect for you.
[h1] "UMU!" [/h1]

35811988.review:
感谢Fate/EXTELLA帮我恢复了正常的消费观。
我特么也是鬼迷了心窍，信了个狗月球人的安利，入了Fate Grand Order的坑。
他告我，
里面大把纸片老婆任你挑，金卡能打又能舔，抽了不吃亏不上当还保值，低星有厨力不坑人，保肝又护发，玩了以后作息时间都正常了，人僧重获第二春，一口气上五十楼不费劲。
人有老婆心里安，做事有了新激情，见异思迁不要紧，小氪怡情带回家，一时玩腻莫捉鸡，助战换7新乐趣，追求刺激可还行，迪昂阿福领路人，左loli右BBA，人生何其极乐至斯也已矣！
氪金获愉悦，攒石得毅力。人生苦短，何以解忧，莫若十连。召唤得金卡，大脑在颤抖，若是没有中，人品会守恒。
人在家中坐，老婆天上来，一发十连，谈笑之间，后宫亭亭如盖矣，岂不美哉？诚心诚念庄司好，后有盐川相勾连，朝入坑，夕死可矣！月球子弟说真相，劝你入坑莫拒绝。
一时脑子不够使，我信了。

然后就尼玛万劫不覆了！
我原先玩CSGO一年半，家里不仅没怀疑我吸毒，还成功理财，国服上线前跑路怒嘎一波韭菜。
我玩FGO一个月半，家里人看我眼神已经不对了！
泳装一期我怡情了四单，枪狐一个没见着，全沉到尼玛庄司后庭环礁里去了！
我告你，你要是恨谁，介绍它玩FGO。
哪个咕哒子要是对你有恩，介绍它玩Fate/EXTELLA。
欢迎来到戒毒所。
FGO里你给大碧池酱一百三，教会礼包秒到货，唯一有语音的是大流士。
Fate/EXTELLA里，畅游十数小时，尼禄C狐大王全程语音，3D建模，分分钟杀必死放出，真正又能打又能舔。
我跟你说，Fate/EXTELLA里C狐开口的那一瞬间，我眼泪不自主的往下淌。

ある程度進めたうえでのレビューです。いくつか分けて評価します。
1、ゲームの動作について　i7-2700K　GTX750ti  メモリ8GBの自作PCです。動作は快適だが、たまにFPS値が30まで落ちる。それ以外は全く問題はありませんでした。
2、ゲーム内容について　内容としては無双ゲーのような感じで爽快感を求める方にピッタリなゲームです。キャラのボイスはフルボイスでストーリーもまぁまぁ面白いです。ただ大まかな流れは同じなので飽きる人もいるかもしれません。
3、BGMについて　中々良いかと
4、グラフィックについて　結構よさ気だが、わがままを言うならもう少し綺麗だったら良かったなと思いました。
5、問題点　強いて言うなら、設定ツールをわざわざSteamのソフトから開かないといけないこと、価格ぐらいですかね。DLC込みは結構高いのでよく考えて買うべきだと思います。ゲームだけを楽しみたいならDLCなしで十分です。

現状ではこのくらいですかね。プレイしていて新たに気づいたことがあったら追記します。

35634018.review:
I would like to start off with that I am a big fan of the Fate universe and that I love grinding games. When I found this game and that it is a hack and slash game, I knew that I was going to love it. People who don't like repetitive botton mashing and gameplay, then I believe that this game is not for you. It is super repetitive (if I have not said it enough already haha). 

What I like about the game is that it has a pretty lengthy story line if you are actually reading everything and completing all areas like I do. They have a good amount of Servants that are playable and some from Stay Night and Zero. The game is also a "visual novel" in a sense like how all the Fates started. You get to do some flirting with your main character and bond with them to make then stronger. Playing with a controller does feel definitely better. Keyboard felt way too complicated. Graphics are optimized with smooth frame rate but character models aren't the best. The art style is not my favourite, it is not as high quality, or same, as the Fate stay night (Subjective). However it does give it its own kind of style to the game I guess. 

What I don't like about the game are a few things. The camera angle and adjustments goes wonky a lot when there are walls in the way behind the character where the camera should be. It starts to zoom in like mad to the back of your Servant's head and when trying to move the camera around is anooying. The only way to snap the camera behind the Servant is to shield. When there are moments when you get to chose dialogue lines, I wish that there was more of a route you actually make, so you basically shape the story through your actions since in the game they do talk about time travel and the multiverse. But in this case, not much changes. there should be a lot more Servants. I believe there is not enough seeing the price at the game it is right now at the time of this review. Maybe they will add more as DLC. Also I wished that you would be ablt to customized the main characters. You can chose either male or female and it ends right there. The male looks like a default male template extra in an anime and the female is cute, but both just have the default brown hair and eyes. 

Overall it is a great game and I and still going to grind the heck out of it. Buy it if you are into hack and slash button mashing games or if you like the Fate series.

35605678.review:
Fate/Extella is set in the Fate franchise an anime doujin game series that has sat mostly in the visual novel field over the last decade and a bit. Coming into the game with no prior knowledge of the story didn’t seem to matter too much and I quickly felt up to speed and what followed was one of the coolest story-driven games I have played all year.

Originally released on the PS4 & Vita the game has now hit the Switch and PC. 

EXTELLA’s story follows the events of Fate/EXTRA on the PSP in which a massive conflict known as the Holy Grail War was fought inside the digital-only realm of SE.RA.PH. The War saw different groups of ‘Servants’ who are incarnations of historical and mythological figures with human ‘Masters’ controlling them trying to gain control of the Moon Cell, a digital lunar lifeform that can grant its bearer any wish of their choosing.

You really need to stick with this bit of the game as getting your head around it to start with is hard but trust me it is well worth it. The game kicks off with the player character (a human who controls servants) alongside Nero Claudius (The Roman emperor digitally reborn in female form) being under attack and threatened to lose control of their kingdom by an incoming force. Where the genius of the game really comes in though is the way the story is told. Without giving too much away let’s say that the game is fairly short clocking in at around 4 to 5 hours but must be played a number of times with a different player character each time with the events changing and being told from a different character’s perspective. The game plays with the idea of dimensions and realities as well as time travel but tells the story in such a fantastic way I was totally gripped from start to finish even though I had no previous knowledge of the fate series.

Gameplay wise the game is essentially a Dynasty Warriors type game with hordes of enemies on a maze-like grid with a number of objectives to complete and stronger characters to kill. The game is fun and the characters are different enough to keep you going but the story is something that is essential to the game.

There are a number of different special attacks that are gained in a variety of ways. Some attacks you charge by killing enemies and other you gain by collecting items around the map. Equally, as you progress through the game and unlock levels you gain access to new moves as well as unlocking points on a very customisable skill tree.

Gameplay is quick and fast and while not perfect great fun and well worth playing if you have any interest in similar titles like dynasty warriors or Hyrule Warriors.

Visually the game is simplistic but works never once giving slow down as the crap tonne of enemies fly around on the screen. Obviously, the PC version is the most impressive but the Nintendo Switch version really holds its own and the game is a joy to play on the small screen.

There are a few issues, however. The game doesn’t tell you a lot as you go through and a lot of things need to be worked out for yourself. Equally the range of enemies in the game is almost nonexistent with the same basic grunts from the first level of the first campaign being the same as the last level of the last campaign.

There is no multiplayer here but Fate/Extella the Umbral star has so much extra content even after you finish the main story that it is likely not a problem for most.

This review was largely based on the Switch version that I played in its entirity. I have played a few hours of the PC version to ensure it runs well.

35587686.review:
Pros:
+ Pretty good Dynasty Warriors/Senran Kagura gameplay
+ Appealing anime presentation
+ Exposition to help explain what is going on
+ Story can be enjoyed by those that picked this up as their first Type-Moon game

Cons:
– Can feel grindy when unlocking and leveling
– Control issues with hitting specific targets with an Extella maneuver
– Hard to keep track of everything during a battle
– Third game from its line, more for Type-Moon players

I can’t say for certain that is where you would want to start getting into Type-Moon games as this is also the first time I’ve played a title from the franchise. It is, however, an enjoyable game despite how grindy is it, even on Animondays. Sure, “Fate/EXTELLA: The Umbral Star” may not have as much of the Marvelous sex appeal, but it still has plenty of appeal on other fronts. So the game is most definitely worth picking up if you’re into anime action games.

Full review can be read on The Gaming Ground [url=http://thegg.net/reviews/fate-extella-the-umbral-star-pc-review-a-pretty-good-anime-action-game/]here[/url].

35373062.review:
I cannot stomach playing this game for more than this. The core gameplay boils down to repetitive button mashing, depth and customization is only toe-deep, enviorments are bland and cramped, enemy variety is almost non-existent, the camera is a mess, animations are pretty janky... Maybe there's a good Fate novel tucked away in there, but to go through the horrible musou-style drivel to get to it is complete lunacy.

Perhaps this is the cynic in me talking, especially since I wouldn't consider myself the biggest fan of this franchise, but I'd like to think that, at least in Nasu's original 2004 Fate/Stay Night foray, this series used to mean something. Servants used to be a really big deal, Noble Phantasms and especially Command Seals were trump cards you only used as a last resort. There was an interesting story going on in Fuyuki, with properly fleshed-out characters behind the scenes of the Holy Grail War. When conversations happened, they had real weight behind them most of the time, questioning the reader on how far should you take your objectives before you start to hurt yourself and others around you. 

Now those elements have lost their meaning entirely. Servants are merely pawns, meant to execute the same repetitive actions over and over again, while being dressed up in Barbie-esque DLC costumes. Command Seals and Noble Phantasms are things you spam mindlessly in order to get to your objectives faster. The story makes Fate/Grand Order's plot look really promising, and that's a feat in and of itself. Your character may as well not even have a 3D model, complete blank slate that he is. Conversations bog down to downright nauseating flirting between you and your Servant. And just to rub salt on the wound, the game runs like a snow plow in windowed mode, even though it looks as simple as an upscaled PSVita novel.

The Fate series is dead, it arguably peaked at Fate/Zero, and died not a minute after Fate/Kaleid Liner came out. There have been some interesting experiments like Fate/Extra for the PSP and what could have been the Fate/Apocrypha MMO, but not even Nasu himself seems to know what to do with the franchise, introducing magical girls, time travelling, and numerous novelized spin-offs that all lead into their own parallel universes. It has become analogous to the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise.

Fate needs to be dragged to the back of the shed and put out of its misery. It has had enough to drink, and this game, in my opinion, is empirical proof of that. I feel the worst for fans of this series, not because I want to take away their enjoyment of this game, but because they deserve much better than this.

L'histoire se passe dans la continuité de Fate/Extra, mais ne suis aucune des routes du jeu, plutôt celle d'Extella/Zero.

Les graphismes ne sont pas top (jeu psvita oblige), mais du coup le journe extrêment bien. Bonnes musiques, certaines reprises de thémes connus sont même très bonnes (Tamamo, Gil) et les doubleurs originaux sont présents.
D'un point de vue gameplay, c'est facile et répétitif, mais ça a le mérite de défouler.

35028047.review:
很高兴能够看到月球大作登录STEAM。百忙之中抽出时间写第一篇评测

游戏整体可玩性还不错，有的朋友告诉我打击感太弱。其实玩起来也还好。
首先说一下EXTELLA攻击，大王的速度太快，没有尼禄的华丽，这是一点需要吐槽的地方。然后大王等人多了一个强化选项，但是没有魔法少女变身动画也很让人感到遗憾，虽然剧情上来说这样设定并没有问题。
宝具动画方面，有的英灵比如尼禄，C狐就十分华丽，相比之下蹭一下人气的吾王的宝具动画就显得有些简陋了。
另外，被很多人吐槽的建模也是一个问题，这游戏DLC价格比本体高出那么多，却给玩家的是一个面部表情略微僵硬，释放EXTELLA攻击嘴部还会抽搐的建模感觉对不起我们这些忠实月球人。好吧，尽管如此还是给大家普及三个字！买买买！
不到一单的钱能买那么多SSR，我他吗氪爆啊！
最后，剧情上，推荐着重玩大王线和最终线，反正大王线能够给人带来的感动不亚于FSN的各个支线。
总结一下，这是一款铁杆月厨不容错过的佳作，玩的时候切记不要光注意打斗了（吐槽一下，键盘玩起来视角有时候真的难受），剧情一定要细细品味！
                                                                                                                                                                By  来自月球的Kazusa

35025391.review:
Je vais l'allumer ce jeu étant donné que je viens de perdre ma save comme un blaireau :)

Alors oui sur le menu principale t'as une option on sait pas pourquoi qui sert à supprimer ta sauvegarde ? J'ai appuyer dessus sans faire attention en voulant quitter le jeu mais malheureusement y'avait pas d'option de confirmation LoL quel jeu de merde techniquement rien que pour ça sérieux.

Alors le jeu est surnoté; il est bon (le gameplay du moins) y'a pas à iech mais clairement surnoté.

Le gameplay est bien là, on s'amuse, on se défoule, les persos sont tous bien différents beaucoup de skills de combos, un vrai Mushou comme on les aiment seulement on y retrouve aussi les même défauts qu'ils ont en général : ils sont pauvres visuellement (pas que ça me dérange mais bon on est en 2017...), ici il y a également un vrai problème de ciblage et une mauvaise caméra à l'oeuvre qu'on est obligé de réajuster en permanence.

Autre point qui m'a gonflé dans ce jeu c'est que dans toutes vos parties c'est la course, vous avez pas une seconde de répit durant la bataille, vous pouvez compter sur aucun allié ils sont tous inutiles autant dire qu'il faut tout faire tout seul, certes ce n'est pas le seul Mushou à souffrir de ça mais ici c'est décuplé car vous répéter sans arrêt le même objectif très mal fichu : comme je le disais, c'est une course, une course pour la conquête de petites zones à capturer défendus par des sbires ou des Servants (un général comme votre perso quoi) . Le véritable problème est que l'ennemi lui peut vous attaquer un territoire sans passer par les routes conventionnelles en droppant en quelques sorte ses armées. Vous êtes harceler de partout vous devez attaquer et défendre en même temps en étant sur le fil du razoir jusqu'à ce qu'au moins vous ayez vaincus la plupart des généraux ennemis. Le but final étant d'obtenir la majoritée des territoires sous votre contrôle afin de faire apparaître le boss final et ensuite le vaincre. Ce qui implique que le rush est impossible, comptez alors au bas mot 20/30 min pour boucler votre partie, c'est long et intense, mais pas intense dans le bon sens selon moi c'est plus frustrant que jouissif d'où mon avis négatif. Il est vraiment regrettable qu'il n'y ait pas d'autres objectif à accomplir, cette répéptitivité agaçante du jeu aura eût raison de moi en plus de ma sauvegarde. 

Ensuite je peux vous parler un peu de l'histoire. Pour la faire simple jvais spoiler en mode troll :
"Il y a 14k ans en arrière y'a eût un cataclysme de mes fesses qui a tout détruit et c'est un cycle qui se reproduit tous les 14k ans lol et là vous arrivez avec votre Master qui a gagner la Holy Grail War puis devient amnésique (oh c'est rare dis donc le coup de l'amnésie pour un scénar) et comme si ça suffit pas faut en plus sauver le monde de ce cataclysme en montant une équipe pour récupérer un territoire imaginaire  pour lutter tous ensemble pour en venir à bout et patati et patata le traintrain habituel des ptites histoires pas chers des Jap. Ajouter à cela nombre incalculable de répliques au raz des paquerettes vues et revues, des persos sans profondeurs clichés à fond dignes de FF13 que du bon quoi aller ptit 8/20 pour une histoire lourde, longue et assomante tel l'Assomoir d'Emile Zola. 
Pas que j'ai quelques chose contre les animes jap, j'ai fait quasi toute la série Fate mais c'est pas le même niveau ici même si je comprends pas la hype autour de Fate, ok il est bien mais c'est pas un chef d'oeuvre faut y arrêter, le jeu est surnoté à cause de la popularité de l'anime, moi je tiens seulement compte du jeu dans cet avis.

Donc voilà tout ça pour dire que c'est une triste déception pour moi, 50 balles pour ça mouais c'est plutôt la baiiiise (et jvous parle pas des DLC). Je préfère mille fois Dynasty ou Samurai Warriors à ça.

34829650.review:
fex–一个损耗情怀的半成品，这个差评给它的剧本

fex在分类上是一个无双割草游戏，但大家都知道，粉丝买这游戏看的不是割草，是你型月，具体来说是蘑菇的剧本，游戏的建模，割草无聊，都可以用一句情怀带过，粉丝可以忍，毕竟主菜不是这些，我们要的是剧本，只要剧本好，就能原谅一切，但，这次的剧本又如何？

以下皆为个人观感，言辞较为激烈

先说说作为主推的大王线，有疑问说我为什么认为大王线是主推呢，我说一下我的个人观点。
大王线是fex的重点线路，虽说四条线各有各的好，但是就我个人观感来说大王线是fex的一大卖点，和描写重点。从一个细节来说的话，小玉和尼禄线都只有一张cg，而大王线在开头就有一张带戒指的cg，在结尾也有一张cg。尼禄和小玉都是旧作中就有的女主角，在本身形象方面都是延续旧作，尼禄的形象在尼禄线好像没怎么变，算是性格的再表现，并没有突破，再后来的维纳斯也只是形象和战力方面的变化，小玉的倾国模式算是为小玉开启的性格上的另一面，到最后返璞归真回归贤妻是形象的再确定，尼禄和小玉都算是拓展，番外，类似ova一样的东西。大王线则是刻画了一个新的女主，从起始，到终结，下了更多的笔墨去刻画阿提拉这一星之公主，不论是剧情的完整度，还是游戏下的描写力度，还有剧情信息量方面方面都比前两线要更为丰富。尼禄线和小玉线在剧情方面算是序章，大王线就是游戏里关于游星等方面的揭露，可以说fex的正篇就是从大王线开始，所以我依据这些认为大王线是fex的主推，不过厨哪个角色就可以认为哪个角色是主角，这我也不好说，只能说从剧情信息量和线路剧情完成性方面对比来看大王线更胜一筹。


作为主推的大王线，感情线路是不完整的，文字量不足的，感情积累的过程太过模糊，从头到尾只能看到开头好满点的大王小心翼翼，满怀心意的和绿白野相处，左一个你是我的御主，右一个你是我的御主，就算是一见钟情你也写出来是一件钟情，写的好像有好感全是因为白野是御主一样，御主身份＝爱人身份？就因为是御主，所以我爱你？就算是大王因为某些特殊情况对御主这个身份有特殊情结也应该写出来，比如作为巨神的大王认为，自己如果要在mc里稍稍挽回一些过去在地面为人的身份，与人类接触，只能以主从的身份维系彼此，自己也只知晓这种方法，而绿白野也作为一个御主，把自己当作人类来看待，这样的剧情。还是希望能多写写感情的积累和起源。
不过这大概也是淡化主角性格的弊端，白野从头到尾在游戏的剧情内没立绘，没语音，台词也只有寥寥几句，还全是玩家选择，多给白野点台词，多给点白野表面剧情吧，心理描写？把白野的个人意志混杂在大篇大篇的客观叙述里，也是间接淡化了白野这个主角的性格特点，如果能给白野大量，起码和cp另一方同样数量的台词这类表面剧情，那么cp感就能平衡一下，而不是现在看上去全为从者服务的cp剧情。剧情内不甚明了的好感起源与积累就导致后面的和大王的互动甜剧情，还有牺牲剧情看得我莫名奇妙，写是写的很甜很虐感人，我也很佩服绿白野的自我牺牲，但总给我一种黑人问号的感觉，白野大王你们俩是在哪里积攒的这么深厚的感情啊？我是不是跳剧情了？你俩是不是在石室里哪个我看不到的地方偷偷约会积攒好感度去了？颇有一种fgo部分从者好感5就突然告白的错愕感
整个大王线的感情描写在某些方面太单薄了，不能说是boymeetgirl，而是boymeetgirlbefore，now，boylovegirldeeply，从相遇，到感情深厚，漏掉了一条线路的感情戏，只浓墨重彩的描写了两人最深爱的甜美夏秋，和壮烈辉煌的冬季，起始的春日被全部删去，总觉得缺些什么
走大王线的缺憾很多，对绿白野和大王的情感起源和发展方面的描写缺失是最大的缺憾，导致最后大王线的壮烈收尾有些无源之水的空虚感，再之后的金诗篇也不能看得特别投入。
关于金诗篇，嗯。。。。套路一样的幼大王回归，随意得可怕的反转剧情（龙娘犯二），只放在支线略微一说的反派阿基米德，莫名奇妙合线的尼禄小玉，尤其小玉，给人的侧室感是怎么回事儿？被打入一个短小支线的红a，在主线的存在感甚至没有大王篇的闪闪高，好歹fe和ccc都是在主线上有个人路线的啊，扶额。

关于阿基米德这个反派，如果是只看主线剧情是完全不清楚他个人的真实性格的，只有结合他的支线线路才能得知游星污染等信息，我个人认为这部分不在主线剧情中讲述会对剧情观感产生破坏和缺失，毕竟不是原创人物，而是历史上鼎鼎大名的阿基米德，我对其型月化的期待非常之高，而主线上的表现。。。你TM告诉我你们就这么写阿基米德？我承认主线上对这个人物不明不白的表现很影响我的观感，直到看过支线，和一部分访谈我才有所理解，所以这么重要的反派主线不进行多方面的表现真的很让我遗憾，一直怀着阿基米德为什么是这个样子推完主线，是我游戏中的一个心结。

龙娘犯二拯救世界作为反转剧情的关键点很随意不在于龙娘的立场，而在于龙娘性格的随意性配不上反转剧情、拯救世界这般重量级的情景，剧情重量的不平衡，既没有情感上的巨大突破，也没有指向性明确的大量伏笔，好像就是这里需要龙娘犯二所以龙娘就犯二了，和阿福的理性蒸发一样的无耻，是作者的无耻，剧情安排上的无耻，没时间想更合理的反转所以用一下龙娘犯二吧，你就算写成龙娘突破游星侵蚀，突破自我都比这来的强

fex在剧情上给人一种半成品的感觉（其他方面的糟糕就不说了，大家都清楚），前两线的过程只有秀恩爱秀恩爱秀恩爱，焰诗篇起码有一个悲剧性的结尾能刺痛玩家，兰词篇就一路平淡到结尾，高不高，低不低，雾蒙蒙的低谷与高潮，没有BGM助攻就更带不起玩家的情绪。未明篇我很中意开始界面的星空，但感情戏上，就像我上面说的，十分不完整，有赶工的嫌疑。至于作为作品收尾的最终路线，金诗篇则更不合格，不论是靠龙娘犯二来逆转残局，没有在本篇细致描写的反派阿基米德，还是给我的我知道剧情我自豪，只要有爱就有希望的拯救大王计划（都打到最后才去思考，之前哪里来的自信？起码前面给点绝望感啊，就像hf路线拯救樱之前的绝望感，和与世界对立的觉悟），不管怎样都是给人半吊子的映像，捧读着我很焦急，开开心心的去无双了，最后捧读着“啊，我想起来了”，然后拯救大王。嗯。。。。。蘑菇你写的轻松就好。

粉丝向作品之所以是粉丝向，是因为资金不足等原因，有很多地方没有办法做好，所以我们粉丝可以容忍，所以，建模差，游戏系统无聊，我们都可以容忍，但这不是型月可以把fex披上无双的皮，然后粗糙对待剧情的理由，剧情是粉丝动力的来源，把自己的长处削减，再配上几乎一无是处的割草和建模，哪方面都难以满足玩家，那买这游戏干啥？真的要当只买wada立绘和全语音？

总而言之，焰诗篇的悲剧结尾让人眼前一亮，之后的兰词篇是漫长的平淡剧情，主菜的未明篇感情戏又不甚完整，最后的金诗篇草草收尾，无论如何，fex在剧情上都不能称之为佳作水准，顶多算某些段落写得很棒的半成品，说的过分一点，这玩意型月你也敢拿出来骗钱？月厨都见不得能靠情怀被骗。现在fex看起来又要成为一个系列作了（fex与fe暂且依照不同世界线区分为不同系列），还是能希望蘑菇能再认真一点对待剧本，能更完整的给我们呈现一个故事，更完整的为我们呈现一个boymeetgirl的浪漫篇章

If you've played Fate/Extra for PSP then this is a must play as it follows the story of its predecessor. It is still a game with a good plot even if you haven't played the previous entry because the plot will become clear after you get to know the cast. The story really is one of the stronger points of this game as it will tug at your heart and wish to see how everything ends.

Gameplay-wise, it's Dynasty Warriors with a couple twists to it. Might be a plus or a minus depending on how you feel about it. I believe this is one of the DW variants with most emphasis on the plot than any other ones.

If you like the Fate Franchise and Dynast Warriors, then you might have a lot of fun with this game like I've had.

Also, Altera best Waifu fite me.

34483991.review:
准高三狗这个暑假的最后一篇测评
首先，不需要518，即可体验这么多5星SSR英灵，对于非洲人来说，岂不美哉？(滑稽  月球厨师当然是DLC点全部购买啦（我特么买爆！）
咳咳 讲正题
（月球厨师可以不用看接下来这一段，毕竟厨力游戏，我还用说什么么）
撇开厨力游戏这一点来看这款游戏，其实存在些问题。首先，最直接的，作为一款近年出的游戏（而且刚发售时还是在PS4次世代主机上），建模略显粗糙（但相比Extra当然有所进步），其次人物动作也十分僵硬，场景不细看还是挺可以，但经不起推敲。这点上，我觉得要是让某暗荣来做这款Fate无双会更好，毕竟暗荣也有海贼和剑风无双的经验，画质上和操作上会更好。然后就是视角上的问题，打着打着视角容易晃到别的地方去，调整还需要使用方向键，十分不方便（也就用格挡键来调整视角比较方便一点了）想设置成键鼠操作基本不行，鼠标不能调灵敏度，稍微一动就乱晃（移植的锅）然后就是游戏模式单调，玩来玩去就几张图里换，月灵驱动这个变身系统有点偷懒，除了尼禄和C狐，其他人基本上外观上没什么变化（果然土狼是亲儿子，红A的干将莫邪还算有点变化x）最后就是为！什！么！PC毛特典都没啊！我的花！嫁！尼！禄！呢？？？
咳咳，抛开这些问题，游戏还是蛮有意思的，全程英灵全配音十分良心，文本内容全汉化，wada的立绘和原画也很赞（c狐太可爱了啊！！！），就是大狗那身紧身衣无力吐槽，还有讲真大帝wada有点画崩了（个人感觉）.... 剧情上，焰诗和兰词篇基本上没太大看点（我站C狐，我狐太人妻了，咪咕~）未明篇开始，走向高潮，大王的反差萌赛高！后面两章结尾部分都有点小虐。 英灵宝具还原出色，技能特效华丽，搭配月灵那个连击系统无双很爽，一款合格的爽游。
小结一下，月球厨师不多说，当然是买爆啦（滑稽）如果是单纯的冲着无双来的话，还需三思。DLC比本体贵系列，DLC全是服装，不买也罢，要是资金不是很充裕的情况下，可以只买女性的，男性的讲真除了闪闪的原初神话好看一点，其他都一般（我，月厨，全买）
最后，30号此游戏的续作要放出消息了，希望在画质和玩法上有所进步，还有PC求同步！！你敢同步，我敢买爆！Last Encore动画也期待一下！ 不说了，给我赖光妈妈打狗粮去了x

34438283.review:
İncelemeyi iki kısıma ayıracağım: Hikaye ve oynanış.

[h1]Hikaye[/h1]

Oyunun çoğunluğu hikayeden oluşuyor. Oynanış kısmı geriye atılıp, diyaloglar ve plot öne çıkarılmış. Diyalogların çoğunluğu Main Heroine'le (Nero, Tamamo veya Altera) yapılıyor. Ana hikayede, takımlardaki yan karakterlere neredeyse hiç yer verilmemiş. Bu yüzden ilk uyarım şu olacak: Eğer yan karakterlerden ilginizi çekenler olduğu için alıyorsanız, almayın. Yan karakterler için Side Stories kısmı açılmış ama -bana sorarsanız- onlar da aşırı yetersiz. Tüm plot, başta Altera olmak üzere, Nero-Tamamo-Altera üçlüsüyle alakalı. Yani eğer bu üçlüyü çok da sevmiyorsanız oyunun hikaye kısmını pek beğenmeyeceksinizdir.
Çünkü oyunun en zayıf, ve en büyük (belki de tek büyük) problemi sizi istemediğiniz karakterler ile oynamak [b]zorunda[/b] bırakması. Nero ve Tamamo karakterlerini hiç sevmeyen, hatta nefret eden biri olarak bu kusur çok fazla gözüme battı. Eğer sadece plot için orda olsalar, yine anlayacağım, "Tamam, anladım. Bunlar plot için burdalar, önemli değil." diyeceğim ama o da değil maalesef. Nero ve Tamamo karakterlerinin /EXTELLA oyununda bulunmasının iki sebebi olabilir: /EXTRA oyununda seçilebilir karakterlerden biri olmaları, dolayısıyla /EXTELLA da /EXTRA sequeli olduğu için, sequele eklenmeleri ve ikinci sebep ise: fanservis. Şimdi, ilk sebebi tam olarak geçerli bulmuyorum çünkü Nameless (Archer) karakteri de /EXTRA oyununda seçilebilir bir karakterdi ama ona özel bir Arc yok. Bu yüzden Nero ve Tamamo karakterlerinin oyunda bulunmasının tek sebebi, fanservis oluyor. Plot tamamen Altera (3. yani en son oynayabildiğiniz heroine) ile alakalı. Bize Flame Poem ve Orchid Poem Arclar'ında (Nero ve Tamamo) sundukları bilginin tamamı Dawn Arc'ında (Altera) tekrarlanıyor, hatta tekrarlanmak kalmayıp daha iyi bir şekilde anlatılıyor. İnsan da ister istemez "Eee, bu Flame Poem ve Orchid Poem Arcları ne işe yaradı o zaman?" diyor. Şu kadarını söyleyebilirim ki: Flame Poem ve Orchid Poem Arclarını atlayıp Dawn Arc'a geçerseniz -ufak detaylar harici- hiçbir şey kaybetmezsiniz. Çünkü plotun ne Nero ne de Tamamo'yla bir alakası var. Her neyse, bu konu hakkında epey konuştum ama uyarmam gerekliydi.
/EXTRA'nın aksine ana karakter apaçık olanı belirtmekten fazlasını yapıyor, gayet güzel monologları var ve şahsen bu monologları, oyundaki birçok diyalogtan daha çok beğendim. Oyun, ana tema olarak bir "White Maiden'in" sembolik hikayesini ve insanı oluşturan üç parçayı işliyor: "Mind", "Body" ve "Soul". İlki pek ilginç gelmese de oyun, harika anlatımı sayesinde böyle bir konuyu bile güzel bir şekilde işleyebilmiş. Dawn Arc'ı insana bambaşka duygular yaşattırabiliyor.
En son olarak Golden Poem Arc'ına gelirsek: Oyun, bizi başta oynadığımız "plotla alakasız heroine" olan Nero ile yeniden oynattırmak zorunda bırakıyor ve asıl hikayeyi bir kenara bırakıp fanservise geri döndürüyor. Bu Arc, Flame Poem ve Orchid Poem'den daha iyiydi ama finalinde baya bir güldüm. Epik bir final falan bekliyordum ama karşıma çıkan şey: Çocuksu bir karakterin kostüm değiştirerek beni güldürmesi oldu. Her neyse, finali pek iyi olmasa da finalden önceki sahne duygu dolu ve çok güzel bir sahneydi. Genel olarak şöyle bir sıralamaya yapabilirim: Dawn>Golden Poem>Orchid Poem>Flame Poem. Tabii ki bu sıralama, sizin zevkinize ve karakterlere sempatinize göre değişebilir. Ben sadece kendim için bu sıralamayı yaptım. Eğer objektif bir şekilde yapmam gerekirse, Golden Poem ile Dawn Arcları yer değiştirir. Bu arada, daha önce de belirttiğim gibi, oyun size karakterleri zorla oynattırıyor. Yani bu Arcları şu sırayla oynayıp, sonraki Arcı açmak zorundasınız: Flame Poem (Nero)>Orchid Poem (Tamamo)>Dawn (Altera)>Golden Poem (Nero).
Her neyse, toplamak gerekirse: oyunun hikayesi güzeldi, tek eksiği Flame Poem ve Orchid Poem Arclarının anlamsızlığı ve boşluğuydu. Konuyu sevmeseniz bile ana karakterin monologlarını, yani yazarın anlatım tarzını beğeneceğinizi düşünüyorum.

[h1]Oynanış[/h1]

Hayatımda ilk defa musou oynayan biri olarak beğendiğimi söyleyebilirim. Tabii ki oynanış kendini [u]fazlasıyla[/u] tekrarlıyor fakat oynanış çok az olduğu için bundan rahatsız olmuyorsunuz, en azından ana hikayeyi oynarken yani. Eklenmesi ve değiştirilmesi gereken şeyler hakkında kısa bir şeyler yazmam gerekirse:
[list]
    [*]Savaş sırasında generalleri yönetebilmeliyiz, Nero bir imparator ve Tamamo bir kraliçe olarak anılıyor fakat nedense oyunda generallerimize emir verme gibi bir seçeneğimiz yok.
    [*]Oyun içinde oynayabileceğimiz karakterler "Change" yeteneği bulunan bir Code Cast ile değiştirilebiliyor sadece, bu böyle olmamalı. Oyuncuya özgürlük vermek için basit bir kısayol tuşuyla oyuncu istediği zaman vice-generale geçebilmeli.
    [*]Zorluk tam anlamıyla acınası, normal zorlukta oynuyorsanız hiç zorlanmadan bitirebilirsiniz, hayatımda ilk defa musou türü oynadım fakat zorluk namına bir şey göremedim. Sadece düşmanların canını yükseltip erken seviyelerde zor kesilebilmelerini sağlamışlar. Belli bir seviyeye geldiniz mi düşmanları tereyağı gibi kesebiliyorsunuz, ilk defa oynadığınız karakterle -1 level olduğunuz için- kesmesi çok daha uzun sürüyor tabii. Kısacası zorluk seviyesini Hard seçerken tereddüt etmeyin.
[/list]

34409443.review:
คะแนน----7/10 
ก่อนอื่นต้องขอเกริ่นก่อนว่าเกมนี้ทำมาเพื่อ Fan Boy Series FATE จะคาดหวังกับ Gameplay หรือกราฟฟิกระดับเทพไม่ได้มากนัก

Gameplay สำหรับใครที่เคยเล่นเกมแนว Dynasty Warriors คงจะทำความเข้าใจได้มากยากคือ "เดินหน้าและฆ่ามัน" ตัวเกมไม่มีระบบยุ่งยากให้ปวดหัว แต่สำหรับคนที่ชื่นชอบเกมแนว RPG หรืออะไรที่แนวๆนั้น อาจจะรู้สึกว่ามันจะขาดๆไปครับ เพราะระบบอัพเกรดตัวละครมีไม่มาก
มาดูกันที่ข้อเสียกันบ้าง สำหรับคอเกม Action หรือเกมแนวสามก๊ก เกมนี้อาจจะไม่ตอบโจทย์เท่าไหร่

Objective ในฉากที่ให้มาก็บังคับผู้เล่นให้ผู้เล่นเดินเป็นเส้นตรง ไม่มีความหลากหลายมากนัก และจุดสุดท้ายที่ยังรู้สึกว่าแย่เหมือนกันในเกมประเภทนี้คือเรื่องของมุมกล้องที่ทำให้เล่นยาก

การควบคุม ผมแนะนำว่าเกมนี้ต้องใช้ Joy Stick เล่นเท่านั้นนะ การบังคับตัวละคร เหมือนกับใน สามก๊กเลย เข้าใจง่าย คอมโบที่มีมาให้ก็อยู่ในระดับกลาง ๆ คือไม่ได้หลากหลายมาก แต่ก็ไม่ได้น้อย เอาจริงๆเราใช้คอมโบหากินอยู่ไม่กี่อันหรอกครับ

Story มี10 ให้100 มันไม่ต้องพูดอะไรมาสำหรับ Series ระดับนี้
เสียงพากย์ มี10 ให้1000  อยู่ในระดับเทพ เหมือนกับ Ainme จากญี่ปุ่นแน่นอน

Graphic ก่อนอื่นต้องบอกก่อนเลยว่าเกมถ้าหวังจะมาเสพกราฟฟิที่สวยงามในเกมนี้ ให้มองผ่านไปได้เลยครับ

ตัวโมเดล 3D และตัวฉากก็ทำมาอยู่ในคุณภาพใกล้เคียงกับตัวละคร บางทีก็ดูกระด้างไป น่าจะอ่อนช้อยกว่านี้ และเวลามี Dialog ขึ้นมา หน้าตาตัวละครไม่ค่อยจะสัมพันธ์กับ Art 2D ด้านข้าง ซึ่งบางทีก็ทำให้หงุดหงิดไม่น้อยเลยครับ 

ตัว Art 2D ทำมาดีให้อารมณ์เหมือนกับอ่านมังงะอยู่เลยครับ

สรุป
+ เกมไม่กินสเปกเครื่องมาก แต่ก็อาจจะดึงเอาทรัพยากรณ์เครื่องของเราออกมาไม่หมด บางฉากยังกระตุกเป็นเจ้าเข้า แต่ Load เครื่องแค่30% ซึ่งต่างจากฉากอื่นที่โหลดเต็มเหนี่ยว
+เนื่อเรื่องดี เล่นแล้วอิน เหมือนกับเราดู Anime ดีๆสักเรื่อง

- ตัวละครที่เล่นได้ มีให้เล่นน้อยไปหน่อย 
- อยากได้ชุดเพิ่ม ก็ต้อง เปย์ นะครัช

ตัวผมเองไม่ใช่ Fan Boy Series นี้ ดู Anime มาบ้างประปราย จริงๆเป็นคอเกม Action มากกว่า ซื้อเกมนี้เพราะหวังว่าจะได้บู๊สะใจ เลยขอให้คะแนนที่ 7/10 คะแนน ขอหักเรื่องของกราฟฟิก และ Gameplay ไปละกันครับ 

ตัวเกมเป็นเกมที่เล่นได้เรื่อย ๆ มีเนื้อเรื่องที่ดี และมีมากจนหลับ เกมนี้เหมาะสำหรับFan Boy Series นี้ จัดไปแบบไม่ต้องลังเล
สำหรับคนทั่วไปผมมองเรื่องของราคาค่าตัวมันอาจจะแพงไปสักนิด เมื่อเทียบกับสิ่งที่เราได้ครับ
เกมนี้ไม่เหมาะกับคนที่เจอเนื้อเรื่องแล้วกดข้ามรัวๆ คือซื้อมาแล้วขาดทุนนะผมว่า

“哪怕它马上会消失，也是真实的愿望。”

34391082.review:
如果作为一款割草游戏那毛病不少、打击感虽然还行，但没自动锁定，场景单调，建模渣到你完全不相信这是一个16年出的游戏，而且模式很单一没有拓展空间，跟隔壁正统做无双的还是差不少

然而对于月厨来说，最重要的是什么？是带动剧情的BGM，是剧情本身，还有剧情中的人物，这是月厨们玩这款游戏的最大动力。光是能看到喜欢的会动的角色并且用着超还原设定的招式不要太爽。剧本方面蘑菇的剧本真的很能走到人的心里去，尼禄线最后打完忍住没哭，大王线和尼禄二周目打完根本没忍住。可以说和喜欢的角色互动，和他们一起走完故事，才是这个游戏真的魅力（说白了就是买剧情送无双），而且国区100出头的价格简直良心（想想FGO一单多少钱，100多就能把一群4星五星收入囊中超值有木有)

虽然这么说，FEX依然逃脱不了厨向游戏的本质。如果没有提前了解一定的世界观设定可能会被一连串的蘑菇语弄的一脸懵逼而无法产生共鸣。加上前面所说的割草玩法和画面并不出色，想要给普通人安利那还是挺难的说实话。听说续作快有消息了，还是这个公司，希望建模能好一点，尤其是看了SEGA的街机版建模，续作再保持FEX这个水平简直不要太丢人

总结：粉丝向游戏，非月厨不建议入手，月厨必入。大王好可爱，GTMD阿基米德

34389438.review: 如果你是一个月厨（比如我本人），这个游戏无疑是非常棒的，可以操作自己喜欢的角色实在是太棒了，抛开战斗方面不说，这其实更是一个文字类游戏，以剧情为主。如果只是路人的话，这个游戏还是要认真考虑一下的，毕竟价格不菲，而战斗只是无双割草。_(:зゝ∠)_

“奏者，让我们重新签订契约吧！”
“奏者哟，卿可否原因陪同余成为此刻这间圣洁礼堂的君主？”

只讲一点，故事如以往型月的系列，剧情很棒，催泪，但又给人能坚强地生活下去的信念，通关后，当主菜单BGM响起时，无论是过去月之圣杯战争的回忆，还是这次与游星战争的回忆，都带着难以抑制的感情迸发出来，让人沉浸在回忆里细细品味过去的点点滴滴。
所以，大家，细细品味这次FATE带给我们的故事吧，月厨，信仰充值吧！

暴君，少女，艺术之王
红色的武器和过分招摇的衣装
若那
散落的红缎其名热情
有幸得宠的忠臣
畅所欲言的新君
“奏者哟，卿既然已经知晓——余于卿之情感确乎爱恋、确乎思慕、确乎追求不可抑制的自艾、确乎以此王尊之位不应轻言，然而啊——今人所言无可救药，便是此情之不可挣脱。”

34374405.review:
If you played Fate/Extra (And if you havn't, I highly recommend it) then this game is for you. If you havn't played Fate/Extra, you might well enjoy this, but do yourself a big favour and pick up Fate/Extra first.

Brief: The game to my mind acts as a sort of epilogue for Fate/Extra, telling a very happy story of events after the  MC Holy Grail War - This alone is brilliant, as one normally never gets to experience the "happy ever after" part of a story, but here it is!

As a result, the story is bubbly, upbeat, with appropriate ups and downs and a lot, and I mean a lot of romantic content.
One downside is that the story can get repetitive, since it tells mostly the same story from multiple perspectives. That's par for the course with Nasu, but Extella's routes are pretty short, so the sense of repetition is real.

The gameplay is, well..I thought it was a lot of fun. It's a very chaotic musou game with relatively simple controls and the ability to swap heroes around added a new layer of fun to it. While I can't say there was anything particularly special about obliterating Plants (Robots) and capturing zones, it felt very satisfying to carve a swath of destruction along a map and watch it turn blue. Pretty fun, all in all, but dont expect anything complicated here! Graphics are not exactly a masterpiece, and I get the feeling it wasn't supposed to be.

The servant fights are also quite simple but still very fun. Nothing more to add there.

Conclusion: This game is made for the fans, really, people who enjoy the Fate Series and -especially- those who played Fate/Extra and it's related games - It's about seeing what happens after the War, and the gameplay mostly plays a supportive role, with most effort seemingly having gone into the story, My Room Events, and cutscenes.

It's a lot of fun if that is your thing.

グラフィックの設定がないとレビューされている方がいらっしゃったので
念のため、普通にありますのでご安心を。

非常に良くバランス調整されており敵の出現率が多いので爽快感もあります。

またFateシリーズ未経験者でも本作品からやっても問題ありませんのでご安心ください。

34367774.review:
[h1]มหาสงครามจอกศักดิ์สิทธิ์ในโลกคอมพิวเตอร์[/h1]

[i][b]** ปล. ขอออกตัวไว้ก่อนนะว่าผมไม่ใช่แฟนซีรีย์เฟท ให้ข้อมูลอะไรผิดก็ขออภัยด้วยครับ **[/b][/i]

Fate/Extella อีกหนึ่งผลงานในซีรีย์ Fate มหาสงครามจอกศักดิ์สิทธิ์ จาก Type-Moon ซีรีย์ที่มีมาหลายภาคที่ออกมาในหลายรูปแบบทั้งนิยาย มังงะ อนิเมะและเกม ตั้งแต่ Fate/Stay Night, Fate/Zero, Fate/Apocrypha รวมถึงเกมมือถืออย่าง Fate/Grand Order และยังมีภาคอื่นๆ อีกหลายภาคที่ไม่ได้กล่าวถึงเพราะมันเยอะมาก ซึ่งเนื้อหาในภาค Extella จะอยู่ในจักรวาลเดียวกับ Fate/Extra และ Fate/Extra CCC ที่เป็นเกมลงให้กับ PSP

ซีรีย์ Fate จะเป็นเรื่องราวที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการต่อสู้ของเหล่ามาสเตอร์ (ผู้ใช้เวทย์มนตร์) เป็นผู้อัญเชิญเหล่า Servant วิญญาณเหล่าวีรชนผู้มีชื่อเสียงในอดีต จับคู่ร่วมมือกันต่อสู้กับมาสเตอร์คนอื่นเพื่อหาผู้ชนะเพียงหนึ่งเดียวที่จะครอบครองจอกศักดิ์สิทธิ์ ใครที่ได้ครอบครองจะสมปรารถนาที่ตนหวังไว้ ซึ่งในภาค Extella จะใช้เนื้อหาเดียวกัน แต่สถานที่การดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในโลกคอมพิวเตอร์ที่มีชื่อว่า “SE.RA.PH” เหล่ามาสเตอร์กับ Servant ร่วมมือกันต่อสู้เพื่อชิง Moon Cell Automaton ที่จะมอบความปรารถนาให้เป็นจริงแก่ผู้ครองครอง ซึ่งเปรียบเสมือน “จอกศักดิ์สิทธิ์” นั่นเอง

Fate/Extella ได้ทีมงาน Marvelous ผู้สร้าง Senran Kagura และ Valkyrie Drive เป็นผู้ออกแบบและพัฒนาตัวเกม จึงทำให้ตัวเกมมีรูปแบบการเล่นเป็นเกมมุโซ เหมือนกับเกมสามก๊ก บังคับตัวละครคนเดียวสู้กับศัตรูพันคนที่เน้นปริมาณเป็นหลัก ไม่เน้นความเก่ง เป้าหมายหลักของเกม คือ การบุกยึดแอเรียต่างๆ โดยต้องแข่งกันเก็บแต้มให้ถึง 15 แต้ม ชิงเอากุญแจที่เรียกว่า Regime Matrix เพื่อครอบครองพื้นที่ทั้งหมดและต่อสู้กับบอสของฉากนั้นๆ ซึ่งในแต่ละแอเรียจะมีแต้มมาก-น้อยต่างกัน ระบบคอมโบต่อสู้ในเกมก็จะเป็นสไตล์แนวมุโซ หลักๆ ก็มีแค่ กด X ตีเบา กด Y ตีหนัก และกด B ท่าไม้ตายพิเศษ นอกเหนือจากนั้นก็มีระบบเก็บเลเวลแบบเกม RPG ระบบติดตั้งสกิลทั้ง Install Skill ที่เป็นสกิลติดตั้งและมีผลทันทีในฉาก ซึ่งดรอปจากบอสในฉากต่อสู้ กับ Code Cast ที่เป็นสกิลสำหรับกดใช้ในฉากต่อสู้ ซึ่งต้องเก็บเงินจากฉากต่อสู้มาคราฟในภายหลัง เช่น เพิ่มพลังป้องกัน, เพิ่มพลังโจมตี, ฟื้นพลังชีวิต ฯลฯ

ทางด้านประสิทธิภาพของตัวเกมถือว่าพอร์ตมาดี ตัวเกมรันได้ลื่นไหล ไม่มีสะดุด ถึงแม้จะเป็นคอมสเปกต่ำระดับ i3-3210 + 8GB of RAM + GTX 1050 Ti (คอมเก่าที่ผมเคยใช้) ก็สามารถรันตัวเกมได้อย่างลื่นไหลในระดับกราฟฟิกสูงสุด ไม่มีปัญหา Game Freeze หรือเกมเด้งออกแม้แต่ครั้งเดียว อีกทั้งทีมงานผู้พัฒนายังใส่ใจตัวเกมด้วยการอัพแพทแก้ไขบั๊กต่างๆ อย่างต่อเนื่อง

[i]Fate/Extella เป็นอีก 1 เกมมุโซ ที่ทำมาเหมือนจะเอาใจเหล่าสาวกซีรีย์ Fate โดยเฉพาะ ด้วยตัวละครและเนื้อหาที่แฟนๆ คุ้นเคยดี ถึงแม้ว่าคุณจะไม่ใช่แฟนซีรีย์เฟท (แบบผม) ก็สามารถเอนจอยกับตัวเกมได้ ทั้งระบบการเล่นที่กินง่ายย่อยง่ายกับประสิทธิภาพของตัวเกมที่คงที่ แต่อาจจะไม่ได้อรรถรสอย่างเต็มที่เท่าไหร่ หากคุณเป็นแฟนเดนตายซีรีย์เฟทนี้ก็จัดไปอย่าให้เสีย หรืออาจจะรอลดราคาซักหน่อยค่อยจัดตอนนั้นก็ยังไม่สายครับ[/i]

+ ระบบการเล่นที่เข้าใจง่าย / ลื่นไหล
+ เกมไม่กินสเปกเครื่องมาก แถมทีมงานยังคอยตามแก้ไขปัญหาของเกมอยู่เป็นระยะ
- ตัวละคร Servant มีให้เล่นน้อยไปหน่อย บวกกับชุดตัวละครที่ปลดล๊อกมีน้อยมาก อยากได้ชุดเพิ่ม ต้องซื้อ DLC เท่านั้น
- ระบบต่อสู้ที่ค่อนข้างน่าเบื่อ เมื่อเล่นไปนานๆ (จะสนุกอีกทีก็คือหลังจากมีระดับ Very Hard ให้เล่น)
+ / - การดำเนินเรื่องที่ทำมาเพื่อเอาใจแฟนซีรีย์เฟทโดยเฉพาะ การเล่าเรื่องเอื่อยๆ ยืดยาวยานเยิ้ม (มีบ่อยครั้งที่ผมสวมบทเป็น “คนไทยหัวใจ skip” กดข้ามคัทซีนผ่านไป)

34261090.review:
型月ファン（なお新参の模様）として評価すると十二分に満足
ゲームとして評価するとフルプライスであることを加味して不満ありといったところです

無双系アクションですが敵の湧き方と移動の微妙なわずらわしさや味方の置物ぶりに辟易します。
プレイヤーキャラクターのモーション自体はおおよそ気に入っていますがキャラクターによっては微妙に使い勝手が悪かったり…

34235702.review:
Cons:
You can tell this game was meant for consoles and not PC. All the graphics options are in a launcher, and if you want to use the mouse to control the camera, you have to go turn it on. I highly recommend a controller, because as clunky as the camera controls are with the joystick they are even worse with keyboard and mouse. I don't like how you can only lock the camera onto enemy Servants and not other major enemies. Also, the love stories are rather icky.

Pros:
It's a Warriors-style game. This means that the combat is extremely satisfying. Not only that, but it's a Warriors-style game in the Fate/ series, which allows for characters like Saber Nero, Jeane d'Arc, Atruria Pendragon, and everyone's least favorite character, GIlgamesh. You can tell he's a great character because those feelings of hate people feel for him are very, very real. Love stories aside, I enjoyed the plot, and the side stories are rather fun to experience. I'd say probably get one of the console versions, however if you don't have any of the other consoles then go ahead and buy it on Steam.

34195886.review:
みこーん！

A colourful Musou clone whose intentions to imitate were writ large from the word 'go'. It builds off the setting from the two Fate/EXTRA games and continues a lot of those games' themes. If you're a fan of a lot of the Servants from the Fate series, you might be disappointed at how lopsided the characterisation can feel with the three leading ladies getting the vast majority of screen time and development through their story modes. Mechanically... it's a Musou game, you've got your square string and triangle charge attacks to form combos. You've got your special move and a super mode that charges faster as your combo increases, and you can collect items to use your ultimate attack. Maps are more in line with the Gundam Musou style than the Sangoku/Sengoku style battlefields with a handful of rooms connected by jump pads. You get spells you can use on your chosen dude and can craft new items that change your spell loadout. Character growth is split between EXP which increases stats and unlocks attacks, and bond (raised through conversation with the main girls, but also by fulfilling side objectives in stages or spamming spells on them) which increases the skills you can equip them with. Bond's effects are strictly mechanical for most characters but the main girls get events as you increase it, if you want to bathe with a Roman despot or roll around on a giant's stomach. Like all Musou games, the gameplay can quickly become dry and repetitive, and thus the game will more than likely live or die based on your investment in the characters.

なんちゃって☆
